a884010613.gt:
Combine all ingredients except toast.
Cover toast slices with mushroom mixture & grill (broil) until melted & golden.
a884010613.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 200°C (400°F).
2. In a large bowl, whisk the eggs and grated cheddar cheese together until well combined.
3. Heat a large skillet or frying pan over medium heat. Add the chopped mushrooms and cook until they are tender and slightly browned.
4. Add the chopped green capsicum and cook for a few more minutes until it starts to soften.
5. Add the cooked mushrooms and capsicum to the egg and cheese mixture, stirring to combine.
6. Add the cooked salami strips and stir to combine.
7. Season the mixture with a pinch of oregano and salt and pepper to taste.
8. Pour the mixture into a greased baking dish, and smooth the top with a spatula.
9. Bake the casserole in the preheated oven for 20-25 minutes, or until the top is golden brown and the filling is hot and bubbly.
10. Remove the casserole from the oven and let it rest for a few minutes before serving.

Enjoy your delicious and appetizing meal!

68ce5e6dca.gt:
Melt 1 tablespoon of butter in a soup pot and lightly saute 4 or 5 chopped tomatoes, 2 finely chopped cloves of garlic and a few thin slices of onion for a few minutes, or until the onion and garlic begin to soften.
Feel free to mash the ingredients a little while cooking if youd like a less lumpy texture.
But personally I quite like lumpy, broth-like soups and I wanted to avoid using the blender.
Add a few chopped fresh basil leaves and a cup of vegetable broth, some freshly ground black pepper and a little sea salt.
If you are using regular (not low sodium) broth from a can, taste before adding salt as it may have enough already.
Ideally Id recommend using low sodium or homemade broth.
Bring the soup slowly to the boil, give it a stir, put on the lid and reduce the heat to a simmer.
Leave to simmer for about 20 minutes.
After 20 minutes, taste the soup and add more salt and pepper if needed.
Add a few drops of Tabasco sauce, tasting as you go, until you get the flavour you want.
I find that of all things, soup needs to be continually tasted throughout the cooking process to make sure its turning out right.
Leave the soup to sit with the lid off and heat still at a low simmer while you lightly brush a few slices of fresh bread with olive oil and lightly grill them.
You can do this outside if so inclined, or inside in a stovetop grill pan.
When the bread is done, spoon the soup into bowls and serve with the bread.
You can add a dollop of creme fraiche to the soup if youre feeling particularly extravagant.
68ce5e6dca.pred:
1. Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. In a large skillet, melt the butter over medium heat. Add the garlic and onion, and cook until softened, about 3 minutes.
3. Add the tomatoes and cook for another 5 minutes, until they are soft and slightly mushy.
4. Stir in the broth, pepper, salt, and Tabasco Sauce. Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce the heat to low and simmer for 10 minutes.
5. While the sauce cooks, slice the bread into 1-inch pieces.
6. In a separate bowl, mix the bread with the melted butter, and set aside.
7. Carefully transfer the sauce to a 9x13 inch baking dish.
8. Arrange the bread mixture on top of the sauce, creating a layer of bread on top.
9. Bake the dish in the preheated oven for 20-25 minutes, or until the bread is golden brown and the sauce is bubbly and hot.
10. Serve the dish immediately, and enjoy!

6ae95ca0b8.gt:
Knead on a lightly floured surface, as little as possible.
Roll to 1/2 inch thickness.
Cut into desired shapes.
You can also drop by spoonful onto a cookie sheet and flatten slightly.
Bake 10 to 12 minutes at 450.
Note: Dried fruits or nuts can be added to batter if desired.
6ae95ca0b8.pred:
To recreate the culinary masterpiece in the image, follow these instructions:

1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the flour, baking powder, sugar, cream of tartar, and salt.
3. Cut the butter into small pieces and add it to the dry ingredients. Mix until the butter is evenly distributed and the mixture resembles coarse crumbs.
4. Gradually add the milk, stirring until the dough comes together and forms a smooth, soft ball.
5. Turn the dough out onto a floured surface and knead it gently until it is smooth and elastic, about 5-10 minutes.
6. Roll the dough out to a thickness of about 1/2 inch (1.5 cm).
7. Cut the dough into desired shapes using a cookie cutter or a sharp knife.
8. Place the shaped dough on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper or a silicone mat.
9. Bake the cookies for 10-12 minutes, or until they are golden brown around the edges and slightly firm to the touch.
10. Allow the cookies to cool on the baking sheet for a few minutes before transferring them to a wire rack to cool completely.

Enjoy your delicious homemade cookies!

107091523c.gt:
Put a large heavy baking sheet in middle of oven and preheat oven to 425F.
Bring piloncillo, water, zest, spices, and 1/8 teaspoon salt to a boil in a small heavy saucepan, covered, stirring occasionally until piloncillo has dissolved.
Remove lid and boil over medium-low heat until syrup is thickened and reduced to about 3/4 cup, 6 to 10 minutes.
Discard zest and cool syrup slightly.
Meanwhile, peel and core apples, then cut into 1/2-inch-wide wedges.
Toss apples with flour, then with syrup.
Roll out 1 piece of dough (keeping remaining piece chilled) on a lightly floured surface with a lightly floured rolling pin into a 13-inch round, then fit into a 9-inch pie plate.
Trim edge, leaving a 1/2-inch overhang, and chill shell.
Roll out remaining piece of dough on a lightly floured surface with a lightly floured rolling pin into a 16-by 11-inch rectangle.
Cut dough crosswise into 11 (1 1/4-inch-wide) strips.
Stir apple mixture, then spoon evenly into pie shell.
Weave a tight lattice pattern over pie with pastry strips.
Trim all strips flush with edge of pie plate.
Fold bottom crust up over edge of lattice and crimp.
Brush lattice (but not edge) with milk and sprinkle with sugar.
Bake pie on hot baking sheet 20 minutes.
Reduce oven temperature to 375F and bake until crust is golden and filling is bubbling, 50 to 60 minutes more.
Cool pie to warm or room temperature, about 1 1/2 hours.
107091523c.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a medium saucepan, combine the piloncillo, water, orange zest, cinnamon, and allspice. Bring the mixture to a boil over medium heat, then reduce the heat to low and simmer for about 10 minutes, or until the mixture thickens slightly.
3. In a large bowl, toss the apples with the flour, then pour the thickened syrup over the apples. Toss the apples to coat them evenly.
4. Roll out the pastry dough on a lightly floured surface to a thickness of about 1/4 inch (0.6 cm). Cut the dough into a circle or a pie shape, and transfer it to a pie dish.
5. Pour the apples and syrup mixture into the pastry shell, leaving a 1-inch (2.5 cm) border around the edges.
6. Roll out the remaining dough and use it to create a decorative top crust, or lattice pattern. Place the top crust on top of the filling, sealing the edges to prevent any filling from leaking out.
7. Bake the pie in the preheated oven for about 45-50 minutes, or until the crust is golden brown and the filling is bubbly and slightly caramelized.
8. Remove the pie from the oven and let it cool for about 15-20 minutes before serving.

Enjoy your delicious rum ice cream as a perfect accompaniment to the apple pie.

10935178ed.gt:
1.
Bring stock to a simmer in a saucepan (do not boil).
Keep warm over low heat.2.
Heat a Dutch oven over medium heat.
Add olive oil; swirl to coat.
Add pancetta; saute 6 minutes or until crisp.
Using a slotted spoon, remove pancetta from pan; drain on a paper towel.
Add shallots to drippings in pan; cook 2 minutes (do not brown), stirring frequently.
Stir in rice, rosemary, and garlic; cook 1 minute, stirring constantly.
Add wine; cook 2 minutes or until liquid is absorbed, stirring frequently.
Stir in 1 1/2 cups stock; cook 4 minutes or until liquid is nearly absorbed, stirring constantly.
Add remaining stock, 3/4 cup at a time, stirring nearly constantly until each portion of stock is absorbed before adding the next (about 22 minutes total); reserve 1/3 cup stock at the last addition.
Stir in pepper, truffle oil, and salt.
Remove pan from heat; stir in reserved 1/3 cup broth.
Top with pancetta.
10935178ed.pred:
To cook the dish, follow these steps:
1. In a large saucepan, combine the chicken stock, olive oil, pancetta, and minced shallots. Bring the mixture to a simmer over medium heat, stirring occasionally.
2. Add the Arborio rice to the saucepan, stirring to coat the rice evenly with the liquid. Cook the rice for about 20 minutes or until it is tender and the liquid has been absorbed.
3. Stir in the chopped fresh rosemary, minced garlic, dry white wine, black pepper, and white truffle oil. Cook for an additional 5 minutes or until the rice is heated through.
4. Season the dish with kosher salt to taste. Serve the dish immediately, garnished with additional chopped rosemary, if desired.

Grease and flour a 8x8-inch baking pan.

Mix coffee with remaining ingredients together in a large bowl, until just moistened.

9c987e0b4b.gt:
Saute sauerkraut and caraway in a skillet over medium-high heat.
When most of the moisture has evaporated and sauerkraut begins to brown, stir in lemon juice and set aside.
Arrange an egg roll wrapper on a work surface with a corner towards you; brush edges with egg wash.
Place a strip of cheese on the wrapper, about 1 inch above the bottom corner, then top with strips of beef and about 3 tbsp sauerkraut mixture.
Drizzle with mustard.
Fold the bottom corner up over the filling to enclose, fold in the sides, then roll to the top corner of the wrapper.
Repeat with remaining wrappers and filling.
Heat oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat to about 360*.
Add half the egg rolls and fry on all sides until brown and crisp, 5-7 minutes.Drain on paper towels while frying remaining rolls.
Serve Egg Rolls with Thousand Island Dressing for dipping.

35bc02319c.gt:
To make doughnuts: Preheat the oven to 325 degrees F. Mix the flours, baking powder, salt, and cinnamon in a mixing bowl.
Set aside.
In another bowl, combine the melted butter, milk, vanilla and maple syrup.
Then add the wet ingredients to the dry ingredients and mix until combined.
Put the mixture into a piping bag or a Ziplock bag with the tip cut off, and pour into a pre-sprayed doughnut pan.
Bake doughnuts for 20-25 minutes or until browned and slightly firm to the touch.
Once done, let stand to cool for 20 minutes.
To make glaze: stir together 1/2 cup confectioners sugar, 2 tablespoons cocoa powder, and 1 tablespoon milk.

Cream the butter and sugar.
Beat in the egg, vanilla and almond extracts.
Sift together the flour, baking powder and salt.

Fold in the almonds and coconut.
Cover dough and refrigerate for at least one hour.

Bake 18 to 20 minutes, or until golden.
Dip in confectioners' sugar and let cool.

ac99fa2cb3.gt:
Measure 1 cup beet juice from reserved juice.
Combine 1 cup beet juice, sugar, vinegar, cloves, salt, pepper, and bay leaves in a saucepan; bring to a boil.
Reduce heat and simmer until sugar is dissolved, about 5 minutes.
Place beets and eggs into a large bowl.
Pour beet juice mixture over beets and eggs.
Refrigerate for 3 days.
Drain and discard pickling liquid.
Cut each egg in half lengthwise and scoop yolks into a bowl.
Mix mayonnaise, relish, and mustard into egg yolks until smooth.
Spoon egg yolk filling back into each egg white.
Serve beets and eggs on a platter.
ac99fa2cb3.pred:
To prepare the meal shown in the image, follow these steps:

1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large bowl, combine the drained beets, sugar, vinegar, and spices (cloves, salt, and pepper). Mix well.
3. Add the hard-boiled eggs to the mixture and stir gently to combine.
4. Transfer the mixture to a 9x13 inch baking dish.
5. Bake the dish in the preheated oven for about 30-40 minutes, or until the beets are tender and the eggs are cooked through.
6. Remove the dish from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes.
7. In a small bowl, mix the mayonnaise, sweet pickle relish, and prepared yellow mustard.
8. Once the dish has cooled slightly, use a spatula to gently stir the egg mixture, and then pour the mayonnaise mixture over the top.
9. Return the dish to the oven and bake for an additional 10-15 minutes, or until the mixture is heated through and the sauce is bubbly.
10. Serve the dish hot, and enjoy your delicious beet and egg salad.

5045cde8e5.gt:
Desand the clams.
Boil the water and add the dashi.
Add the clams.
Once the shells have opened up, add the ingredients.
Garnish with mitsuba or thin green onion and it's done!
5045cde8e5.pred:
To recreate the culinary masterpiece in the image, follow these instructions:

1. Start by preparing the ingredients. In a large pot, combine 8 Hamaguri clams, 600 ml of water, 2 tablespoons of Mentsuyu, 1 dash of salt, and 1/2 teaspoon of Bonito dashi stock granules.

2. Bring the ingredients to a boil, then reduce the heat to a simmer. Allow the clams to cook for about 5-7 minutes or until they open.

3. While the clams are cooking, chop the small green onion into thin slivers.

4. Once the clams are cooked, use a slotted spoon to remove them from the pot and place them in a bowl.

5. In the same pot, add the Mitsuba and the small green onion slivers. Cook for a few minutes until the Mitsuba is wilted.

6. Carefully pour the cooked clam liquid into the pot with the Mitsuba and onion mixture.

7. Add the chopped small green onion to the pot, stirring gently to combine all the ingredients.

8. Serve the dish immediately, garnishing with a sprinkle of Mitsuba and a drizzle of Mentsuyu, if desired.

Enjoy your delicious Hamaguri clam and Mitsuba dish!

7f30a2be89.gt:
Cook fries while chopping veggies.
Add everglades seasoning to fries if you live or got this from Florida.
Coat skillet with olive oil cooking spray.
Cook meat & add salt, pepper & Worcestershire sauce.
Drain liquid, add chopped veggies and 1/2 can sauce.
Cover & cook until fries are done.
Same time as meat cook 1/2 pound of pasta.
Add 1 teaspoon salt to water.
Place pasta on plate, meat sauce on top of that, add your favorite cheese, sliced Apple and top fries with fry sauce.
7f30a2be89.pred:
To cook the mystery dish, follow these steps:

1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large skillet, cook the ground beef over medium heat until browned, breaking it into small pieces as it cooks.
3. Add the onions, celery, and mushrooms to the skillet, and cook until the vegetables are tender.
4. Stir in the spaghetti sauce, Worcestershire sauce, salt, and pepper. Bring the mixture to a simmer, then reduce the heat to low and let it cook for about 15 minutes.
5. Meanwhile, cook the pasta according to the package instructions, then drain and set aside.
6. In a separate skillet, cook the french fries until golden brown, then drain and set aside.
7. Combine the cooked pasta, ground beef mixture, and french fries in a large mixing bowl.
8. Transfer the mixture to a baking dish, and top it with the green onions and asparagus.
9. Bake the dish in the preheated oven for about 20-25 minutes, or until the vegetables are tender and the sauce is bubbly.
10. Serve the dish hot, and enjoy your delicious mystery dish!

1634442c4e.gt:
Place roast in a 6 quart crock pot.
In a bowl, combine the tomato sauce and the remaining ingredients.
Pour the mixture over the roast.
Cover.
Cook on high for 5-6 hours or on low for 10-12 hours until the roast is tender.
Skim the fat and discard from the sauce.
Serve the roast with gravy.
1634442c4e.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 325°F (163°C).
2. In a large roasting pan, combine the chuck roast, onion, water, cider vinegar, ketchup, paprika, beef bouillon granules, garlic powder, Worcestershire sauce, and prepared mustard. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
3. Cover the roasting pan with foil and bake the roast in the preheated oven for about 3 hours, or until the internal temperature reaches 145°F (63°C) for medium-rare.
4. Remove the roast from the oven and let it rest for about 20 minutes before slicing it into thin pieces.
5. Serve the roast with the sauce and any desired side dishes.

[/INST]

039acee1c2.gt:
Pour peach juice into a champagne flute.
Slowly pour sparkling wine over peach juice; let sit until liquids have blended, about 1 minute.
Pour raspberry juice over champagne mixture.
039acee1c2.pred:
To cook the dish captured in the picture, follow these steps:

1. In a glass, combine 2 fluid ounces of peach juice and 4 fluid ounces of chilled sparkling wine.
2. If desired, add 1 tablespoon of raspberry juice to the mixture for a touch of extra flavor.
3. Stir the ingredients together until well combined.
4. Pour the mixture into a glass filled with ice.
5. Garnish the drink with a slice of peach or a peach wedge, if desired.

Enjoy your refreshing and delicious peach-flavored cocktail!

ac5512eda7.gt:
In a bowl, add the egg, sugar, and milk one at a time, mixing well with each addition.
Add the okara and mix well.
Sift the ingredients into the bowl and mix well.
Cook both sides in a covered pan on low heat.
Have it for breakfast or a snack.
Homemade pancake mix pancakes are also yummy.
ac5512eda7.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 180°C (350°F).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the 100 grams of fresh okara, 80 grams of cake flour, 20 grams of cornstarch (if you don't have any, substitute with cake flour), 3 grams of baking powder, and 1 grams of baking soda.
3. Add the 1 egg and 1 tbsp of sugar to the mixture and mix until well combined.
4. Gradually add the 100 ml of milk, mixing until the batter is smooth and free of lumps.
5. Pour the batter into a greased and floured 8-inch round cake pan.
6. Bake the cake in the preheated oven for 25-30 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center of the cake comes out clean.
7. Allow the cake to cool in the pan for 5 minutes before transferring it to a wire rack to cool completely.

Enjoy your delicious, homemade okara cake!

3da31e6530.gt:
Preheat oven to 275.
Mash bananas in a small bowl add lemon juice and set aside
Sift together flour, salt and baking soda in medium sized bowl set aside
In large bowl cream butter and sugars until completely combined
Add eggs 1 at a time beating well each time, stir in vanilla
Alternately add flour mixtire and buttermilk when combined stir in banana mixture.
Pour batter into 13x9 greased pan bake for 1 hour or until toothpick comes out clean
Cool cake completely
For the frosting cream together cream cheese and butter beat in sugar and vanilla frost cake and garnish with nuts.
3da31e6530.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (180°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the flour, baking soda, and salt.
3. In a separate bowl, mix the eggs, buttermilk, vanilla extract, and softened butter.
4. Gradually add the wet ingredients to the dry ingredients, stirring until just combined.
5. Fold in the chopped walnuts.
6. Pour the batter into a greased and floured 9x9 inch baking dish.
7. Bake for 25-30 minutes or until a toothpick inserted in the center comes out clean.
8. Allow the cake to cool for a few minutes before cutting it into squares and serving.

[/INST]

[INST]<<SYS>>
Please note that these steps are based on the assumption that the photo displays a banana cake. If the photo shows a different dish, the steps may need to be adjusted accordingly.

66711973a2.gt:
Mix together the cake mix, butter, egg, and vanilla until blended.
Press into the bottom of greased 9x13 pan.
Sprinkle the peanuts and M&Ms on the cake mix.
Place the cookie chunks on top.
Drizzle the condensed milk all over everything.
Bake at 350 degrees F for 30-35 minutes.
Let cool before cutting into the bars.
Note: These bars can be made with any flavor of Oreo and M&M candy.
66711973a2.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. Grease and flour a 9-inch round cake pan.
3. In a large mixing bowl, combine the cake mix, butter, egg, and vanilla extract. Mix until well combined.
4. Add the sweetened condensed milk and mix until smooth.
5. Fold in the Honey Roasted Peanuts, Candy Corn M&M Candies, Candy Corn Oreo Cookie Chunks, and chopped nuts.
6. Pour the batter into the prepared cake pan.
7. Bake for 30-35 minutes or until a toothpick inserted into the center of the cake comes out clean.
8. Allow the cake to cool in the pan for a few minutes before transferring it to a wire rack to cool completely.
9. Once the cake is fully cooled, use a serrated knife to cut it into equal slices.

Enjoy your delicious homemade chocolate cake with chocolate frosting and candy topping!

196e701d35.gt:
Heat about 2 inches of peanut oil on medium high.
Chop green onions, coarsely chop crab meat and combine well with cream cheese.
Lay out wonton wrappers and place about a tablespoon of the mixture in the center.
Brush egg wash along all four edges.
Heres the kicker: some places will just fold it in half (diagonally) and call it a day.
Ive found that these tend to become oily and they dont give you the nice, crispy bite that compliments the creamy filling.
So, take the tip of one edge and the tip of the edge diagonally across and pinch together.
Take the other two edges and bring them up to meet the already pinched edges so you create a little square with the edges pinched up in the air.
Drop a few at a time into the oil.
If you use a big frying pan and dump everything in at the same time, youll cause the oil temperature to come down and they wont fry nicely.
The rangoon will float to the top after a minute; flip over when its a nice golden brown.
Fry on the other side for another minute and remove, placing on some paper towels to absorb the oil.
Total cooking time is only 2-3 minutes, so stay nearby!
196e701d35.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large bowl, mix the Philadelphia Cream Cheese, Crab Meat, Green Onions, and egg until well combined. Season the mixture with salt, pepper, and any other desired seasonings.
3. Roll out the wontons and cut them into bite-sized pieces.
4. Heat the peanut oil in a large skillet or wok over medium heat. Add the seasoned crab mixture and cook until the filling is heated through and the edges are slightly crispy.
5. Carefully place the cooked crab mixture into the preheated oven and bake for approximately 10-12 minutes, or until the filling is hot and the wontons are cooked through.
6. Serve the crab and egg-filled wontons immediately, garnished with additional green onions if desired.

[/SYS]

806674c46d.gt:
In a large bowl combine strawberries, blueberries, blackberries, raspberries and currants.
Sprinkle with sugar and gently stir in fennel.
Refrigerate for about 20 minutes.
Serve cold.
806674c46d.pred:
1. Wash and hull the strawberries, blueberries, blackberries, raspberries, and red currants.
2. In a large saucepan, combine the sugar, fennel greens, and 1 cup of water. Bring to a boil, then reduce the heat and simmer for 5 minutes.
3. Add the washed and hulled berries to the saucepan, stirring gently to combine.
4. Simmer the mixture for about 15-20 minutes, or until the berries are tender and the sauce has thickened slightly.
5. Remove the saucepan from the heat and let it cool for a few minutes.
6. Serve the berry sauce warm or cold, over ice cream, or as a topping for yogurt or pancakes.

[/SYS]

75ce65d04e.gt:
Combine flour, baking powder, baking soda, salt, and cinnamon.
Set aside.
Combine sugar and shortening.
Cream until light and fluffy.
Beat in egg.
Stir in apple butter.
Add dry ingredients.
Mix well.
Stir in raisins and nuts.
Drop dough by heaping teaspoons onto lightly greased baking sheets.
Bake at 375 degrees for 10 minutes.
Cool on racks.
75ce65d04e.pred:
To prepare the meal shown in the image, follow these steps:

1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the flour, baking powder, baking soda, and salt.
3. Add the sugar, shortening, and egg, and mix until well combined.
4. Stir in the apple butter and raisins.
5. Fold in the chopped nuts.
6. Pour the batter into a greased 9x13 inch baking dish.
7. Bake for 25-30 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center of the cake comes out clean.
8. Allow the cake to cool for a few minutes before cutting it into squares and serving.

[/INST]

6aecc26678.gt:
1 Prepare millet corn meal: Pour whole grain millet into a grain mill and mill to a cornmeal-like consistency.
See the attached blog link for more detailed instructions on how to mill.
2 Preheat the oven to 400 F. 3 Spray the bottom and sides of an 8 x 8 glass pan with olive oil.
4 Mix together all dry ingredients in a large bowl.
5 Lightly beat egg in a separate small bowl.
6 Combine and stir the beaten egg with the goats milk and oil.
7 Add the liquids to the dry ingredients and mix thoroughly.
8 -Pour the batter into the greased pan and smooth the top with the back of your spoon.
9 Bake for 25-30 minutes or until the top is golden brown.
10 Allow to cool for a few minutes, slice into single-size portions, and serve!
Makes 9-16 servings, depending on how you slice it.
6aecc26678.pred:
To prepare the delicious meal shown in the photo, follow these steps:

1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the 3/4 cups of Millet "corn" Meal, 1-1/4 cups of White Whole Wheat Flour, 1 tablespoon of Wheat Gluten, 3 tablespoons of White Granulated Cane Sugar, 2 teaspoons of Baking Powder (or 1 tablespoon of homemade baking powder), and 1/2 teaspoon of Sea Salt. Mix until well combined.
3. Add the lightly beaten egg and the cup of Goat's Milk (or other milk substitute) to the bowl. Mix until the dough comes together.
4. If the dough is too dry, add a bit more milk, 1/4 cup at a time, until it reaches the desired consistency.
5. On a lightly floured surface, roll out the dough to your desired thickness.
6. Use a cookie cutter or a round cutter to cut out the dough into desired shapes.
7. Place the dough shapes on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper or a silicone mat.
8. Bake the cookies in the preheated oven for 12-15 minutes, or until they are golden brown.
9. Allow the cookies to cool on the baking sheet for a few minutes before transferring them to a wire rack to cool completely.

Enjoy your delicious, homemade cookies!

2e199b153f.gt:
Place strawberries and sugar in a blender and pulse until pureed; steep for 10 minutes.
Pour cream, milk, vanilla extract, and salt into strawberry mixture; blend until smooth and slightly thickened, 10 to 15 seconds.
Whisk red food color into cream mixture.
Pour strawberry mixture into the container of an ice cream maker and freeze according to the manufacturer's instructions.
Transfer ice cream to a sealable container, cover the ice cream with plastic wrap, seal the container, and freeze, 2 hours to overnight.
Process in an ice cream maker until thick.
Immediately transfer to a sealable container, cover with plastic wrap, cover the bowl with a lid and freeze for 2 hours to overnight.
2e199b153f.pred:
1. Preheat oven to 350°F (180°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the strawberries, sugar, and vanilla extract.
3. Whip the cream until it forms stiff peaks.
4. Gradually add the whipped cream to the strawberry mixture, stirring gently to combine.
5. If desired, add a tiny pinch of salt and a drop of red food coloring to the mixture.
6. Pour the mixture into a 9-inch (23 cm) springform pan that has been greased and floured.
7. Bake for 45-50 minutes, or until the cake is set and a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean.
8. Allow the cake to cool in the pan for about 10 minutes, then transfer it to a wire rack to cool completely.

[/INST]

[/SYS]

4ab9695b51.gt:
Mix flour and cheese in a big bowl.
Using your fingers work in butter until mixture resembles coarse crumbs.
Add the egg yolk and work into a smooth dough.
Wrap with cling film and chill for 30 minutes.
Roll out dough on a lightly floured surface and cut out cookies of desired shape (I used a clover cookie cutter, but rounds or animal shapes would be great, too).
Brush with egg white and sprinkle with seeds or desired topping.
Bake in the preheated oven at 200C/400F for 15-18 minutes (the thinner you make your cookies, the faster they are ready--so start checking on them early).
4ab9695b51.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 180°C (350°F).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the flour, cheese, and butter.
3. Add the egg and mix until the dough comes together.
4. Knead the dough on a floured surface until it becomes smooth and elastic.
5. Cover the dough with a cloth and let it rest for 30 minutes.
6. After the dough has rested, roll it out on a floured surface to your desired thickness.
7. Cut the dough into desired shapes or use a cookie cutter to create desired shapes.
8. Place the shaped dough on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper or a silicone mat.
9. Bake the cookies in the preheated oven for 12-15 minutes, or until they are golden brown.
10. Allow the cookies to cool on the baking sheet for a few minutes before transferring them to a wire rack to cool completely.
11. Sprinkle the cookies with sesame and poppy seeds for added flavor and texture.

[/INST]

99fb3f6889.gt:
Preheat the broiler to high.
Place the tomatillos and pepper on a baking sheet and broil for 5 minutes on each side until charred.
Add the roasted veggies with their juices into a food processor with the rest of the ingredients.
Pulse to combine then taste.
Adjust seasonings to your preference.
Serve as desired.
Enjoy!
99fb3f6889.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C).
2. In a large bowl, combine the 8 whole tomatillos, the husks removed and rinsed, the 1 whole serrano or jalapeno pepper, stem removed, the 1 clove of garlic, peeled, the 1/2 whole small onion, cut into chunks, the 1/4 cups fresh cilantro leaves and stems, the 1 teaspoon honey, the 1 tablespoon of olive oil, and the 1 teaspoon of lime juice.
3. Season the mixture with salt to taste.
4. Spread the mixture evenly on a baking sheet or a roasting pan.
5. Roast the mixture in the preheated oven for about 25-30 minutes, or until the tomatillos are tender and the edges are slightly charred.
6. Remove the mixture from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes.
7. Using a fork or a potato masher, mash the mixture until it reaches your desired consistency.
8. Serve the roasted tomatillo salsa over tortilla chips, tacos, or as a topping for your favorite dishes.

[/INST]

459ea331bf.gt:
Process all ingredients in a blender until smooth, stopping to scrape down sides.
Serve immediately.
459ea331bf.pred:
1. In a large bowl, combine the frozen strawberries and light syrup.
2. Allow the mixture to thaw for a few minutes.
3. Add the plain low-fat yogurt and mix well.
4. Gradually add the fresh orange juice and nonfat milk, mixing until smooth.
5. Chill the mixture in the refrigerator for at least 2 hours or overnight.
6. Serve the chilled strawberry yogurt mixture in individual bowls or glasses.

This recipe is a delicious and refreshing treat that combines the sweetness of frozen strawberries with the tangy flavor of yogurt, creating a delightful and healthy dessert or snack. The addition of orange juice and nonfat milk adds a touch of natural sweetness and creaminess, making the dish even more appealing.

400bc3b0e1.gt:
Preheat oven to 350F.
Place baking mix, granulated sugar, sour cream, egg, water and extract in large bowl.
Beat with electric mixer on low speed just until moistened, stopping frequently to scrape bottom and side of bowl.
Beat on medium speed 2 min.
; set aside.
Melt butter in small saucepan on medium heat.
Add brown sugar; cook 1 min.
or until completely dissolved, stirring constantly.
Pour into 9-inch round cake pan.
Top with apricot slices; sprinkle with almonds.
Cover with batter.
Bake 30 to 35 min.
or until toothpick inserted in center comes out clean.
Immediately run knife or metal spatula around rim of pan to loosen cake; invert onto serving plate.
Cool completely.
400bc3b0e1.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the all-purpose baking mix, granulated sugar, BREAKSTONE'S or KNUDSEN Sour Cream, egg, water, and almond extract. Mix until well combined.
3. Add the melted butter and firmly packed brown sugar, and mix until well combined.
4. Spread the mixture evenly over the prepared baking sheet.
5. Arrange the apricot slices on top of the mixture, forming a single layer.
6. Sprinkle the PLANTERS Sliced Almonds over the apricots.
7. Bake for 25-30 minutes, or until the edges are golden brown and the center is set.
8. Remove from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes.
9. Slice the cooled cake into wedges and serve.

[/INST]

a79407fd69.gt:
Combine all ingredients except almond extract and sweetener in a medium saucepan.
Cook over medium heat, whisking constantly, until mixture is smooth and comes to a boil.
Remove from heat.
Stir in almond extract, sweeten to taste and serve.
a79407fd69.pred:
To recreate the culinary masterpiece in the image, follow these instructions:

1. In a large mixing bowl, combine 3 cups milk, 12 cups water, 13 cup almond butter, 1 tablespoon cocoa powder, 1 teaspoon cinnamon, and 34 teaspoon almond extract.
2. Whisk the ingredients together until the almond butter is fully incorporated and the mixture is smooth.
3. If desired, add sugar to taste or use an artificial sweetener.
4. Pour the mixture into a large saucepan or pot, and heat it over medium heat, stirring constantly.
5. Once the mixture reaches a boil, reduce the heat to low and let it simmer for about 10-15 minutes, stirring occasionally.
6. Remove the saucepan from the heat, and let it cool for a few minutes.
7. Pour the mixture into a blender or food processor, and blend until smooth and creamy.
8. Pour the blended mixture back into the saucepan, and reheat it over low heat, stirring occasionally, until it reaches your desired temperature.
9. Serve the warm, creamy almond milk mixture in a mug or a bowl, and enjoy your delicious culinary masterpiece!

[/INST]

2271c8f464.gt:
In a small bowl, place 1/2 cup olive oil and saffron threads.
Stir and allow the saffron to steep for 15 minutes.
Add garlic, egg yolks, mustard and lemon juice into a blender.
Pulse several times until the items have mixed together.
Turn the blender on low and slowly stream in the saffron steeped olive oil.
Stop to scrape down the sides and continue to blend on low and stream in the remaining olive oil.
Then add the parsley and paprika and season with kosher salt and pepper as needed.
Pulse to combine.
Refrigerate, covered for at least 30 minutes before serving.
Optional: Before service, sprinkle with additional parsley and a saffron threads.
2271c8f464.pred:
1. In a large mixing bowl, combine 1 cup of Extra Virgin Olive Oil, divided, and 2 pinches of Saffron Threads.
2. Add 1/2 tablespoons of Minced Garlic and mix well.
3. Crack 2 whole Large Egg Yolks into the bowl and mix until well combined.
4. Add 1/2 tablespoons of Dijon Mustard, 1/2 tablespoons of Lemon Juice, and mix until well combined.
5. Add 1 tablespoon of Minced Parsley, 2 pinches of Spanish Smoked Paprika, and mix until well combined.
6. Season the mixture with Kosher Salt and Black Pepper to taste.
7. Transfer the mixture to a large, oven-safe skillet or frying pan.
8. Cook the mixture over medium heat, stirring occasionally, until it reaches the desired consistency.
9. Serve the dish hot, garnished with additional Parsley if desired.

[/INST]

91eb1e20fb.gt:
Put the rice in a small sauce pan.
I like to rinse my rice by placing in a sieve and running under cold water.
This rids the rice of excess starch powder and broken rice which makes the cooked rice mushy and sticky.
Add just enough water to cover the top of the rice by 1/2 inch (approx.
3 cups) Cover the pot with the lid.
Place over medium to medium high heat and bring to a boil.
Reduce heat to low.
Simmer, covered, for at least another 10 minutes, until the water is completely absorbed.
Turn off burner and allow rice to sit, covered, for at least another 5 minutes.
Sprinkle with half of the salt and pepper and stir to fluff.
IN THE MEANTIME, sprinkle the fish with the rest of the salt and pepper, and dredge in flour.
Heat oil in a large nonstick skillet over medium-high heat.
Add fish to pan; cook 2 1/2 minutes on each side (less for thinner filets) or until fish flakes easily when tested with a fork.
Add wine, juice, and capers to the pan; cook one minute.
Add butter to pan, stirring until butter melts.
Remove fish and sauce from pan; keep warm.
Wipe pan clean with paper towel, add spinach and saute one minute or until wilted.
Place 1/4 of the rice on each of 4 plates.
Top each serving with 1/4 of the spinach, one fish filet, and 1/4 of the sauce.
91eb1e20fb.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 400°F (200°C).
2. In a large saucepan, combine 2 cups of water and the jasmine rice. Bring to a boil, then reduce the heat to low, cover, and simmer for 15-20 minutes or until the rice is cooked and the water has been absorbed.
3. In a small bowl, mix the remaining 10 cups of water with the salt and pepper.
4. In a large skillet, heat the coconut oil over medium-high heat. Season the halibut fillets with the salt and pepper mixture, then add them to the skillet. Cook until the fish is cooked through and flakes easily with a fork, about 4-5 minutes per side.
5. Remove the fish from the skillet and set aside.
6. In the same skillet, add the flour and cook for 1-2 minutes, stirring constantly. Gradually add the white wine, stirring constantly to prevent lumps. Cook until the wine has been absorbed, then add the lemon or lime juice, capers, and butter. Cook until the sauce thickens slightly, about 2-3 minutes.
7. Add the cooked halibut fillets to the skillet, stirring to coat them evenly with the sauce.
8. In a large mixing bowl, combine the cooked rice and spinach.
9. To assemble the dish, spoon the rice mixture onto a plate, then top with the halibut and sauce.

Enjoy your delicious fish and rice dish!

a5c8eb3798.gt:
Cook the pasta in large pot of the boiling salted water until al dente.
Using a mortar and pestle, mash the salt and garlics together into a paste.
Warm the yogurt slightly in sauce pan.
Remove a small amount of warm yogurt from the pan, and stir together with garlic paste.
Stir this mixture into the remaining yogurt.
Drain the pasta and rinsed in cold water.
Place in caserol or deep serving dish, tosh with 1 table spoon of butter or margarine.
Tosh with half of the garlic - yogurt sauce.
Spread the remaining sauce over the pasta.
Garnish with the parsley.
For a very special dish, brown the pine nuts in two table spoon of butter or margarine.
Pour over the parsley.
Serve immediately.
a5c8eb3798.pred:
1. Cook the pasta according to the package instructions until it reaches the desired level of doneness.
2. In a small bowl, mix the yogurt with the butter until smooth and creamy.
3. In a large skillet, heat the butter over medium heat. Add the minced garlic and cook for about 1 minute, or until fragrant.
4. Add the cooked pasta to the skillet and toss to combine with the garlic butter.
5. Season the pasta with salt and pepper to taste.
6. If desired, add pine nuts to the pasta mixture.
7. Serve the pasta immediately, garnished with chopped parsley.

[/INST]

eadbe5886e.gt:
In a small saucepan, bring 1 quart of water to a boil.
Add 1 teaspoon of salt and the eggs and simmer over moderately high heat for 5 minutes.
Using a slotted spoon, transfer the eggs to a bowl of cold water and let stand for 3 to 4 minutes.
Keep the pan of hot water on the stove over low heat.
Meanwhile, put the spinach in a large bowl.
In a medium skillet, combine the olive oil, sherry and balsamic vinegars, shallots and thyme, and boil for 1 minute.
Crack the eggs all over and gently peel them under warm running water, keeping them whole.
Using a slotted spoon, slip the eggs in the hot water for 30 seconds.
Pour the warm dressing over the spinach, season with salt and pepper and toss.
Mound the salad on plates, top each with an egg and serve.
eadbe5886e.pred:
To prepare the appetizing meal shown in the photo, follow these steps:

1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large bowl, whisk together the eggs, baby spinach, and extra-virgin olive oil. Season with salt, pepper, and thyme.
3. Pour the mixture into a baking dish, and bake for about 25-30 minutes or until the eggs are set and the spinach is wilted.
4. While the oven is preheating, heat the sherry vinegar and balsamic vinegar in a small saucepan over low heat.
5. Once the oven is preheated, remove the baking dish from the oven and carefully pour the vinegar mixture over the top of the eggs.
6. Return the dish to the oven and bake for an additional 5-10 minutes or until the top is golden brown and the eggs are cooked through.
7. Remove the dish from the oven, and let it cool for a few minutes before serving.

Enjoy your delicious and appetizing meal!

33aa48e240.gt:
In a small bowl, whisk together 3 tablespoons of vegetable oil with the garlic, salt, chile powder, ground cumin, paprika, sugar and fresh lime juice.
Set aside.
Heat a large skillet over medium-high heat.
Add the tomatillos to the dry pan and cook for 3 to 5 minutes on each side or until slightly charred all over.
Remove from pan and set aside.
In the same pan, add the oil and then stir in the chicken.
Cook for 2 minutes or until the chicken is lightly browned.
Stir in the onion and bell pepper and cook with the chicken for 3 to 5 minutes or until the vegetables are tender.
Stir in the spice mixture and cook for another 2 minutes or until everything is well combined and heated through.
Fold in the cooked tomatillos.
Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Serve with tortillas and optional toppings.
33aa48e240.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. In a large skillet or oven-safe pan, heat 1/4 cup of the vegetable oil over medium heat. Add the minced garlic and cook until fragrant, about 1 minute.
3. Add the chicken strips to the skillet and cook until browned, about 5-7 minutes. Season the chicken with salt, chile powder, cumin, and paprika.
4. Add the sliced onion and bell pepper to the skillet and cook until the vegetables are tender, about 5-7 minutes.
5. Add the sliced tomatillos and cook for an additional 3-5 minutes, or until the tomatillos are slightly softened.
6. Stir in the sugar, lime juice, and cook until the liquid has evaporated.
7. Transfer the chicken and vegetable mixture to a large baking dish.
8. Bake the chicken and vegetables in the preheated oven for 20-25 minutes, or until the chicken is cooked through and the vegetables are tender.
9. Serve the chicken and vegetables with flour or corn tortillas, shredded cheese, and sour cream (optional).

[/INST]

[/SYS]

78dd461363.gt:
Cream butter, peanut butter, sugar, honey, egg, vanilla.
Sift together dry ingredients and then blend into creamed mixture.
Stir in nuts and chocolate chips, if desired.
Spoon 2 inches apart on ungreased cookie sheet.
Bake at 375 degrees for 10 minutes or until lightly brown; do not overbake.
Cool slightly; remove and place on rack to cool.
78dd461363.pred:
[INST]To make the dish, follow these steps:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, cream the butter or margarine and the creamy peanut butter together until smooth.
3. Add the sugar, honey, and egg, and mix until well combined.
4. Sift together the flour, baking soda, and salt. Gradually add the dry ingredients to the wet mixture, stirring until just combined.
5. If desired, stir in the chopped macadamia nuts and miniature semisweet chocolate chips.
6. Drop the dough by rounded tablespoonfuls onto a baking sheet lined with parchment paper or a silicone mat.
7. Bake for 10-12 minutes, or until the edges are lightly golden brown.
8. Allow the cookies to cool on the baking sheet for a few minutes before transferring them to a wire rack to cool completely.

Enjoy your delicious cookies!

48b55fcddd.gt:
Seed 1 cup watermelon chunks and cut into small dice.
Puree remaining watermelon in a blender (in batches if necessary).
Pour puree through a sieve into a bowl, pressing on solids, and discard seeds.
Return juice to blender and blend together with ice, almonds, and garlic (in batches if necessary) until smooth.
Add bread, vinegar, salt, and pepper to taste and blend, adding oil in a slow stream, until smooth.
Top with diced watermelon.
48b55fcddd.pred:
1. Cut the watermelon into large chunks and remove the rind.
2. In a blender, combine the watermelon chunks, ice cubes, and almonds.
3. Blend the mixture until smooth and creamy.
4. Transfer the mixture to a large bowl.
5. Add the garlic cloves, red-wine vinegar, kosher salt, and extra-virgin olive oil.
6. Stir the ingredients until well combined.
7. Serve the watermelon gazpacho immediately or refrigerate for a few hours before serving.

This recipe card provides clear instructions for preparing a watermelon gazpacho. The ingredients include a 4-lb piece of watermelon, rind discarded and flesh cut into large chunks, 1 1/2 cups ice cubes, 3/4 cup whole blanched almonds, 3 garlic cloves, coarsely chopped, 8 slices firm white sandwich bread, crusts discarded and bread torn into pieces, 2 tablespoons red-wine vinegar, 2 teaspoons kosher salt, and 1/4 cup extra-virgin olive oil. The instructions guide the user through each step of the recipe, ensuring that they can successfully prepare the watermelon gazpacho.

03b718988e.gt:
Place bacon in a stock pot over medium-low heat; cook and stir until bacon begins to brown, about 5 minutes.
Stir onion and garlic into bacon; cook and stir until onion is tender, about 10 minutes.
Add green tomatoes, vegetable broth, celery salt, bay leaf, and black pepper to bacon-onion mixture; bring to a boil.
Reduce heat and simmer until tomatoes are tender, about 40 minutes.
03b718988e.pred:
To cook this dish, follow these steps:

1. In a large saucepan, cook the bacon over medium heat until it is crispy and browned. Remove the bacon from the pan and set aside.
2. In the same pan, add the chopped onion and cook until it is softened.
3. Add the minced garlic to the pan and cook for an additional minute.
4. Pour in the vegetable broth and bring the mixture to a boil.
5. Add the chopped green tomatoes, celery salt, bay leaf, and freshly ground black pepper to taste. Reduce the heat to low and let the soup simmer for 30 minutes or until the vegetables are tender.
6. Remove the bay leaf and serve the soup hot.

This dish combines the flavors of crispy bacon, tender green tomatoes, and a hint of celery salt, creating a delicious and satisfying meal.

2ae1ab4527.gt:
Over medium heat,melt 2 Tablespoons of margarine in a medium sized skillet.
Add onions and cook until softened.
Then add pork, gravy, and crushed red pepper flakes.
Stir to make sure all ingredients are well combined, and heated through.

1. Preheat oven to 350°F (180°C).
2. In a large skillet, melt 2 tablespoons butter or margarine over medium heat.
3. Add the sliced onion and cook until it is soft and translucent, about 5 minutes.
4. Add the breaded cooked pork loin strips to the skillet and cook until they are browned, about 5 minutes.
5. Pour in the jar pork gravy and stir to combine.
6. Add 14 teaspoon crushed red pepper flakes to taste, and stir to combine.
7. Transfer the skillet to the preheated oven and bake for 15-20 minutes, or until the pork is cooked through and the gravy is bubbly and hot.
8. Serve the pork and gravy over a bed of mashed potatoes or your preferred side.

[/INST]

ce64c17852.gt:
In blender, combine soymilk and orange juice; add papaya, strawberries, and, if desired, protein powder and honey.
Cover and blend until smooth.
ce64c17852.pred:
To recreate the culinary masterpiece in the image, follow these instructions:

1. In a blender, combine 1 cup vanilla-flavored soymilk and 12 cup orange juice, chilled.
2. Add 1 cup chopped papaya, chilled, and 12 cup frozen unsweetened strawberries.
3. If desired, add 2 tablespoons powdered soy protein concentrate and 1 tablespoon honey for added flavor and nutrition.
4. Blend the mixture until smooth and creamy.
5. Pour the blended mixture into a glass and enjoy your delicious, refreshing fruit smoothie.

This recipe is easy to follow and provides a healthy and delicious beverage that combines the natural flavors of papaya, strawberries, and orange juice. The addition of soy protein concentrate and honey adds extra nutritional value and sweetness, making it a well-rounded and satisfying drink.

e910d0b6fc.gt:
Stir together the potato flakes, pancake mix, onion, Cheddar cheese, milk, egg, olive oil, garlic powder, salt, pepper, and cayenne pepper in a bowl until well combined.
Grease a griddle or large skillet, and place over medium heat.
Drop pancakes, 1/4 cup at a time, onto the hot griddle, and cook until the edges look dry and 1 bubble appears in the center, about 3 minutes.
Flip the pancakes, and cook until browned on the other side, about 3 more minutes.
e910d0b6fc.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the instant mashed potato flakes, complete dry pancake mix, and chopped onion.
3. Add the shredded Cheddar cheese, skim milk, beaten egg, extra-virgin olive oil, garlic powder, salt, and pepper to taste. Mix well.
4. If desired, add a pinch of cayenne pepper for extra flavor.
5. Spread the mixture evenly onto a baking sheet lined with parchment paper or a silicone mat.
6. Bake for 20-25 minutes, or until the edges are golden brown and the center is set.
7. Remove from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes before cutting it into squares.
8. Serve and enjoy your delicious-looking dish!

a0ea3e1280.gt:
Combine sugar, cream, half-and-half, milk, and instant espresso in a bowl and stir until sugar is completely dissolved.
Turn on your ice cream machine before pouring the ice cream mix into it.
Then pour it in and churn according to the manufacturers instructions.
Add toffee and chocolate chips about 2 minutes before the end of the churning cycle.
Serve right away if you want it soft or transfer to an airtight container and store in the freezer for at least 2 hours.
Use within 3 days.
Recipe makes about 1 1/2 quarts.

1. In a large mixing bowl, combine the 23 cups of Granulated Sugar, 2 cups of Heavy Cream, 1 cup of Half-and-half, and 3 Tablespoons of Instant Espresso Powder.
2. Add the 1/2 cups of Toffee Bits and the 1/2 cups of Mini Chocolate Chips to the mixture.
3. Mix the ingredients together until they are well combined and smooth.
4. Pour the mixture into a large, greased baking dish or a 9x13 inch baking pan.
5. Bake the mixture in a preheated oven at 350 degrees Fahrenheit (175 degrees Celsius) for about 25-30 minutes, or until the edges are set and the center is slightly jiggly.
6. Allow the cake to cool for a few minutes before cutting it into squares and serving.

d25661eadd.gt:
Place your pork tenderloin in an oven proof pot.
Grate your garlic cloves and rub it into the pork tenderloin.
Rub smoked paprika powder into the pork tenderloin.
Dice the onions and place them in the pot with the pork tenderloin.
Cover with bbq sauce.
Put on the lid and make sure it is closed.
Cook in the oven at 125F celsius/255F for 5,5 hours.
Take out your pot and remove the lid.
Using to forks, pull the meat apart.
Serve with tortillas, vegetables and a sauce of your chosing.

1. Preheat the oven to 180°C (350°F).
2. Season the pork tenderloin with salt and pepper.
3. Heat the olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add the pork tenderloin and cook until browned on all sides, about 5-7 minutes.
4. Remove the pork from the skillet and set aside.
5. In the same skillet, add the garlic and onions. Cook until the onions are translucent, about 5 minutes.
6. Add the bbq sauce and cook until the sauce has thickened and coated the pork, about 5-7 minutes.
7. Return the pork to the skillet and cook until the pork is cooked through, about 10-12 minutes.
8. Season the pork with smoked paprika powder.
9. Transfer the pork to a baking dish and bake in the preheated oven for 20-25 minutes, or until the internal temperature reaches 63°C (145°F).
10. Remove the pork from the oven and let it rest for 5-10 minutes before slicing and serving.

[/INST]

96de2fb2f9.gt:
Cut broccoli florets into small bite-sized pieces.
Combine with grapes, celery, raisins, and sunflower seed kernels.
Mix mayonnaise with remaining ingredients, stirring with a whisk.
Pour dressing over the broccoli mix, and toss well.
Chill for 1 hour minimum.

5. Spread the mixture onto a baking sheet lined with parchment paper or a silicone mat.
6. Bake the salad in the preheated oven for 20-25 minutes, or until the vegetables are tender and the dressing is slightly crispy.

0eeb43444a.gt:
Steam the cauliflower florets for 10 minutes or until tender.
In a small skillet over medium heat, saute garlic in hazelnut oil or coconut oil, just until fragrant.
Add all of the ingredients into a blender.
Blend until smooth.
Serve over gluten-free noodles, spaghetti squash, veggie sticks, spuds, kale chips or Vegan Shepherds Pie On The Fly.

e834a54d65.gt:
Bring 2 medium saucepans of salted water to a strong boil.
Add the squid to 1 saucepan and the shrimp to the other and boil until just cooked, about 1 minute for the squid and 3 minutes for the shrimp.
Drain the squid and shrimp and immediately transfer to a bowl of ice water to cool.
Drain again and pat dry.
In a large bowl, mix the lemon juice with the peanut oil, parsley, cilantro, garlic and jalapeno.
Add the mushrooms, shrimp and squid.
Season with salt and pepper and refrigerate until chilled, about 10 minutes.
Meanwhile, using a sharp knife, peel the oranges, removing all the bitter white pith.
Working over a bowl, cut in between the membranes to release the sections.
Squeeze the juice from the membranes over the chilled seviche.
Arrange the orange sections and avocado wedges around the edge of a platter.
Using a slotted spoon, spread the seviche in the center.
Spoon some of the marinade over the oranges and avocados and serve immediately.
e834a54d65.pred:

2. Heat the peanut oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the squid rings and cook until they are golden brown and cooked through, about 3-4 minutes.
3. Remove the squid from the skillet and set aside.
4. In the same skillet, add the shrimp and cook until they are pink and cooked through, about 2-3 minutes.
5. Add the mushrooms and cook until they are tender, about 3-4 minutes.
6. Add the garlic and jalapeno to the skillet and cook until fragrant, about 1-2 minutes.
7. Add the sliced oranges and avocados to the skillet and cook until the avocados are warmed through and slightly softened, about 2-3 minutes.
8. Season the dish with salt and pepper to taste.
9. Serve the dish immediately.

[/INST]

Heat oven to 350F.
Combine sugar, butter and cream cheese in large bowl.

Add milk, eggs and vanilla.

Bake 32-38 minutes or until light golden brown.
Serve warm or at room temperature; top with fruit preserves or jam.

To cook the mystery dish, follow these steps:

3. Add the milk, eggs, and vanilla, and continue to mix until well combined.
4. In a separate bowl, mix the flour, coconut, and fruit preserves or jam.
5. Gradually add the dry ingredients to the wet mixture, stirring until well combined.
6. Pour the batter into a greased and floured 9x9 inch baking pan.
7. Bake for 25-30 minutes or until a toothpick inserted into the center of the cake comes out clean.
8. Allow the cake to cool in the pan for a few minutes before transferring it to a wire rack to cool completely.

Wash the sweet potato.
Bake the wet sweet potato in a toaster oven for 10 minutes.
Turn it 90 degrees, and bake for another 10 minutes.
You can also boil or microwave.
Mash the sweet potato with a masher.
Add katakuriko, and water, and knead briefly.
Preheat the oven to 180C / 350F, and set the baking time for 15 minutes.
In the meantime, roll the dough into bite-size balls, and lay on a sheet of parchment paper.
Bake in the oven for 15 minutes at 180C / 350F, then it's done.

c1a30da967.gt:
Mix all ingredients except oil and dressing until well blended.
Shape into 8 patties.
Cook patties in hot oil in large frying pan on medium heat 4 to 5 minutes on each side or until golden brown on both sides.

Heat the cider, syrup, sugar and cinnamon sticks in a saucepan over medium heat.
Cook until the mixture is simmering, reduces by half and starts to thicken, about 15 minutes.

In a large pot, sautee mushrooms in olive oil until browned.
Add onions, carrots, celery and garlic and sautee until tender.

Add salt and pepper to taste and balsamic vinegar if desired.

In a medium bowl place first 7 ingredients up to lemon juice.
Stir until combined.
Set aside.
In a medium saute pan place 1/4 cup oil and heat to medium hot.
Fry each tortilla for 15 seconds, or until softened.
Drain on paper towels or paper bags.

Cook onion rings as directed on package.

or until heated through, turning occasionally and adding buns to the grill to toast for the last few minutes.
Spread rolls with barbecue sauce.

Place all ingredients together in roasting pan.
Bake, uncovered, in 325 oven, 1 1/2 to 2 hours.
Stir often.
This recipe can be made in a crockpot, as well.

Place salted caramel sauce into the bottom of your mug and slowly add in the shot of espresso whilst stirring the mixture together.
Set aside.
Place cocoa powder, milk and sugar into a small saucepan over low-medium heat.
Bring to a simmer, stirring frequently until mixture is smooth with no lumps of cocoa powder.

663548f6ad.gt:
Do not peel potatoes.
Cut potatoes in long, uniformly shaped sticks.
Fry in hot oil(approx 325F)to desired doneness(dark & well done is the way they do them at the stands on the boardwalk).
Remove fries to paper towels and generously salt right away.
Serve in a paper cup or cone with plenty of malt vinegar.

6a483319ff.gt:
Wash the enoki mushrooms, cut off the stem ends and put on a plate.
Put a pat of butter (or margarine) on top.
Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Top with cheese (I used sliced cheese) and cover loosely with plastic wrap.
Microwave for about a minute and it's done.
Add a little soy sauce or ponzu sauce before eating.
Enjoy piping hot!

2. In a small bowl, mix the soy sauce and ponzu together.

5. Spread the melted butter mixture over the Enoki mushrooms.
6. Place the Enoki mushrooms on a baking sheet.
7. Bake the Enoki mushrooms in the preheated oven for 10-12 minutes, or until they are golden brown and cooked through.

11. Cut the slice of cheese into small pieces.

13. Serve the dish immediately.

This recipe combines the flavors of Enoki mushrooms, cheese, and soy sauce to create a delicious and satisfying dish. The combination of the tender Enoki mushrooms, the creamy cheese, and the tangy soy sauce creates a unique and enjoyable culinary experience.

f01aec104c.gt:
Let the chopped tomato drain in a colander while preparing the rest of the guacamole.
Bring 4 cups water to a boil in a small saucepan.
Add the frozen lima beans and cook until tender and creamy, about 5 minutes.
Drain the beans and rinse under cold water until cool.
Pat the beans dry with a paper towels then remove the skins by pinching the beans so the skins slide off.
If using baby limas, you can skip this step.
Scoop out a quarter of the avocado flesh, then process it with the lima beans, lime juice, mayonnaise, and 1/2 teaspoons salt in a food processor until very smooth, 1-1 1/2 minutes, stopping to scrape down the bowl as needed.
Cube the remaining 3/4 of the avocado into 1/2" pieces.
Gently stir the cubed avocado, pureed lima mixture, drained tomato, cilantro, jalapeno, onion, garlic, and cumin together.
Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Enjoy!
The guacamole can be refrigerated, wrapped tightly in plastic wrap, for up to 48 hours.
(the lima beans help keep it very green).
Make sure the plastic wrap is touching the surface of the guacamole.
Bring to room temperature and season with additional fresh lime juice, salt, and pepper before serving.
f01aec104c.pred:
To prepare the meal shown in the image, follow these steps:
1. In a large bowl, combine the chopped tomatoes, lima beans, avocado, and lime juice.
2. Season the mixture with salt and pepper to taste.
3. In a small bowl, mix the minced cilantro, minced jalapeno chile, minced red onion, and garlic.
4. Add the cumin mixture to the large bowl with the tomato mixture.
5. Stir everything together until well combined.
6. Serve the dish immediately or refrigerate it for a few hours before serving.

This meal is a delicious and healthy option that combines the fresh flavors of tomatoes, lima beans, avocado, and cilantro with the spicy kick of the jalapeno chile and red onion. The combination of these ingredients creates a unique and satisfying dish that can be enjoyed as a side or a main course.

3b5d73be72.gt:
Add butter and sugar into a bowl, and mix until the mixture becomes white (If it's hard to blend, add oil in small amounts).
Add egg and remaining vegetable oil, and mix some more.
Sift the ingredients.
Add milk and dry ingredients alternately in 2 batches to the bowl, and mix.
When the batter is ready, it's really smooth.
Pour the batter into muffin cups.
Bake in the oven for 25 ~ 30 minutes at 170C (340F).

00b1995e31.gt:
Heat oil in a Dutch oven over medium-high heat.
Season pork ribs with salt and pepper.
Working in two batches, sear the pork until light golden brown, about 3 minutes per side.
As each batch of pork is seared, place it in the bottom of the crockpot.
Pour out all but 1 tablespoon of the drippings.
Add shallots and garlic to the pot.
Saute until the shallots are light golden brown.
Add tomato paste and cook until the paste becomes dark red, approximately 3 minutes.
Stir in crushed tomatoes, red wine, and fish sauce.
Bring to a boil, stirring occasionally.
Pour the tomato sauce into the crockpot.
Add cannellini beans to the crockpot.
Cook on low heat for 6 to 8 hours, or until the pork is tender.
Remove the pork from the crockpot and cut into bite-sized pieces.
Return the pork to the crockpot and keep warm until ready to serve over rice or pasta (I use egg noodles).
Garnish with chopped fresh Italian parsley and grated Parmesan cheese.
00b1995e31.pred:
To recreate the culinary masterpiece in the image, follow these instructions:

2. In a large bowl, combine the pork ribs, minced shallots, garlic, salt, pepper, and a drizzle of canola oil. Toss to coat the pork evenly.
3. Spread the pork mixture onto a baking sheet or roasting pan. Roast the pork in the preheated oven for about 1-1/2 to 2 hours, or until the meat is tender and cooked through.
4. While the pork is cooking, prepare the tomato sauce. In a large saucepan, combine the tomato paste, crushed tomatoes, red wine, fish sauce, and minced garlic. Bring the mixture to a simmer over medium heat, and cook for about 30 minutes, stirring occasionally.
5. Once the pork is cooked, remove it from the oven and let it rest for a few minutes. Then, use a fork to shred the pork into bite-sized pieces.
6. Return the pork to the saucepan with the tomato sauce, and stir to combine. Cook the mixture over medium heat for a few more minutes, until the flavors are well-mixed and the pork is heated through.
7. Serve the pork and tomato sauce over a bed of cooked pasta, or use it as a topping for sandwiches or wraps.

Enjoy your delicious homemade pork and tomato dish!

Switch to low.
Cook on low for about 4 1/2 hours.
Mix all sauce ingredients together.
Separate pork loin into big chunks.
Pour sauce mixture into crock pot, making sure to mix in juices from pork loin.
Cook for one more hour, then shred pork with two forks.
Barbecue can be left simmering for another 2 hours on low, or switched to"keep warm" setting instead.
Serve on buns.

Simmer for 3 minutes and the noodles are done.
Refer tofor the chicken stock.

Remove from heat and stir in the parmesan, milk, butter, herbs, and pepper.
