5. If you have Korean nori seaweed, add it to the rice mixture. If not, you can use regular nori seaweed.

6. Serve the dish immediately or let it cool down for a few minutes before serving.

This dish is a delicious and healthy meal that combines the flavors of rice, sesame, and seaweed. The dashida adds a unique taste to the dish, while the sesame seeds and seaweed provide a crunchy texture and nutritional benefits. Enjoy!

020aa88369.gt:
Halve dough.
Roll out both to 34cm X 30cm.
Leave to rise for 10 minutes.
Carefully spread each one with 1 TBSP of vegemite, coating all the dough.
Sprinkle the grated cheese over the bases, keeping some for sprinkling on the top.
Roll the dough from the 34cm end loosely til you have a sausage.
Slice into 10 pieces and arrange on baking tray, loosening them up a little.
Sprinkle remaining cheese on the scrolls.
Bake at 200.C for about 20 minutes.
I always check after 10 to see how they are going.
Enjoy!
020aa88369.pred:
[/SYS]

1. Preheat the oven to 200°C (400°F).
2. Roll out the pizza dough on a lightly floured surface to your desired thickness.
3. Spread a thin layer of vegemite evenly over the rolled-out dough.
4. Sprinkle the grated cheese evenly over the vegemite layer.
5. Place the pizza dough in a preheated oven and bake for 10-12 minutes, or until the crust is golden brown and the cheese is melted and bubbly.
6. Remove the pizza from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes before slicing and serving.

Enjoy your delicious homemade pizza!

064cb6c3cf.gt:
In a large Dutch oven, cook green beans and ham on medium heat with water up just over the beans.
Cook for 20-30 minutes.
Add potatoes and salt, cover and turn heat down to low, cook another 15-20 minutes or until the potatoes are done when pierced with a fork.
Note: Amount of ham and salt can be adjusted to your taste.
064cb6c3cf.pred:
To recreate the culinary masterpiece in the image, follow these instructions:

1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large pot, cook the diced bacon, salt pork, or ham until the fat is rendered and the meat is crispy.
3. Add the fresh green beans to the pot and cook until they are tender but still crisp.
4. In a separate pot, bring the water to a boil and cook the diced potatoes until they are tender.
5. Drain the potatoes and return them to the pot.
6. Add the cooked bacon, ham, or salt pork to the pot with the potatoes.
7. Add the 1 tablespoon of salt and stir to combine.
8. Transfer the mixture to a baking dish and bake in the preheated oven for 25-30 minutes, or until the potatoes are golden brown and the green beans are tender.
9. Serve the dish hot and enjoy your culinary masterpiece!

[/INST]

aa904a4678.gt:
Place your jello shot cups on a cookie sheet (that you know will fit in your fridge).
This will make for easy transport.
Place 2 cups VERY hot water (but not boiling) in a pitcher.
Slowly pour in contents of jello packages while stirring constantly.
Stir until completely mixed (about 2 minutes).
Add in the remaining ingredients and stir well.
Pour into plastic jello shot cups or you can use a 9x13 pan if you don't have the cups.
Chill 4 hours or more until set.
If you are using a cake pan, simply cut the set jello into squares and place on individual cupcake cups for serving.
If you want to get silly, top each one with a small dollop of whip cream just before serving!
aa904a4678.pred:
1. In a large mixing bowl, combine the two boxes of blue Jello gelatin with the very hot water. Stir until the gelatin is fully dissolved.
2. Add the coconut rum and blue schnapps to the mixture, stirring gently to combine.
3. Pour the mixture into a large, clear, and clean container or a large mixing bowl.
4. Add the unsweetened pineapple juice to the mixture, stirring gently to combine.
5. Refrigerate the mixture for at least 4 hours or overnight, allowing it to set.
6. Once the mixture has set, carefully pour it into a large, clear, and clean serving dish or individual serving bowls.
7. Garnish the dish with fresh fruit, such as pineapple slices, and serve immediately.

[/INST]

112e4c6352.gt:
Slice panettone into 1 inch slices; cut each slice into 4 wedges.
In a small bowl, whisk together the mascarpone, orange preserves, and orange juice.
In a separate large bowl, whisk the eggs, cinnamon, and nutmeg.
Heat the olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat.
Dip the panettone into the egg mixture, coating well.
Place into the hot oil; fry until golden brown, about 3 minutes per side.
Serve with the orange mascarpone sauce.
112e4c6352.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, whisk together the mascarpone cheese, orange juice, and orange marmalade until smooth.
3. Add the eggs one at a time, whisking well after each addition.
4. Gradually add the ground cinnamon and nutmeg, whisking to combine.
5. Pour the mixture into a greased 9x13 inch baking dish.
6. Cut the panettone into 1-inch cubes and evenly distribute them on top of the cheese mixture.
7. Drizzle the olive oil over the top of the panettone.
8. Bake for 45-50 minutes, or until the cheese is melted and bubbly, and the panettone is cooked through.
9. Allow the dish to cool for a few minutes before serving.

[/INST]

This recipe is a delicious twist on a traditional cheesecake, using panettone instead of traditional cheesecake crust. The combination of the sweet panettone, tangy orange flavors, and the rich mascarpone cheese creates a delightful dessert that is perfect for special occasions or simply enjoying with friends and family.

99ac5fb3f6.gt:
Mix first 10 ingredients in a bowl.
Take a wonton wrapper and place 1 heaping teaspoon of filling in center.
Moisten edges with water, fold over and press to seal edges.
Add 3 tablespoons of Peanut Oil to a large skillet and saute until the bottoms are golden brown.
When golden brown, add 1/2 cup chicken broth, cover pan and simmer 8 minutes.
Remove from pan.
Reserve broth in a separate bowl and repeat process until all potstickers are cooked.
Keep warm on a plate covered.
99ac5fb3f6.pred:
To recreate the culinary masterpiece in the image, follow these instructions:

1. In a large bowl, combine the ground pork, chopped green onions, soy sauce, rice wine, sesame oil, minced garlic, beaten egg, cornstarch, salt, and pepper. Mix well.
2. Allow the mixture to rest for 15-20 minutes to allow the cornstarch to thicken the pork.
3. Heat peanut oil in a large skillet or wok over medium-high heat.
4. Using a spoon, scoop out small amounts of the pork mixture and shape into small balls.
5. Carefully place the pork balls into the hot oil, being careful not to overcrowd the pan. Cook for about 3-4 minutes or until they are golden brown on all sides.
6. Remove the pork balls from the oil and drain on a paper towel-lined plate.
7. In a small bowl, mix the chicken broth and cornstarch. Stir until smooth.
8. Return the pork balls to the skillet and add the chicken broth mixture. Cook for about 2-3 minutes or until the sauce has thickened and coated the pork balls.
9. Serve the pork balls over rice or noodles.

[/INST]

c2277ff083.gt:
In a large pot, bring the water and salt to a boil; add the lentils, reduce the heat to medium-low and cook for 30 minutes or until the lentils are tender but not overcooked; drain.
In a colander, rinse the cooked lentils under cold water until slightly cool, then place them in a bowl.
Whisk together the remaining ingredients; pour over the lentils and combine well.
Chill for 1 to 2 hours and serve cold.
c2277ff083.pred:
1. In a large pot, combine 8 cups of water and 2 tablespoons of salt. Bring to a boil, then reduce the heat to low and simmer for approximately 20-25 minutes or until the lentils are tender but still have a slight bite.

2. While the lentils are cooking, heat 14 cups of olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add 14 cups of white wine vinegar and stir to combine.

3. Add 12 teaspoons of dried ground cumin and 12 teaspoons of dried ground coriander to the skillet. Cook for 1-2 minutes, stirring constantly, until fragrant.

4. Add 1 teaspoon of cayenne pepper to the skillet and stir to combine. Cook for an additional 30 seconds or until the spices are fragrant.

5. Once the lentils are cooked, carefully drain the water and add the cooked lentils to the skillet with the oil and vinegar mixture. Stir to combine and cook for a few minutes until the lentils are heated through.

6. Season the lentil mixture with salt and pepper to taste.

7. Serve the lentil and vegetable mixture over a bed of rice or quinoa, and enjoy your delicious and healthy meal.

e05a7c1c5e.gt:
Preheat oven to 400F.
Stir together salt, allspice, and cayenne.
Pat pork dry and sprinkle spice rub all over pork, pressing to adhere.
Heat oil in a 12-inch heavy skillet over moderately high heat until hot but not smoking, then brown pork, 1 tenderloin at a time, on all sides, about 1 minute each.
Transfer as browned to a large roasting pan and arrange 2 inches apart.
Roast in middle of oven until an instant-read thermometer inserted diagonally 2 inches into center of each tenderloin registers 155F, 20 to 25 minutes.
Let pork stand 5 minutes before slicing.
e05a7c1c5e.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large bowl, mix the coarse salt, ground allspice, and cayenne pepper.
3. Season the pork tenderloins with the spice mixture, ensuring they are evenly coated.
4. Heat the oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the pork tenderloins and cook until browned on all sides, about 5-7 minutes.
5. Remove the pork from the skillet and place it on a baking sheet.
6. Bake the pork in the preheated oven for 15-20 minutes, or until it reaches an internal temperature of 145°F (63°C).
7. Allow the pork to rest for a few minutes before slicing it into thin pieces.
8. In a large bowl, combine the pineapple, avocado, red onion, and cilantro. Mix well.
9. Serve the pork with the Pineapple-Avocado Salsa on the side.

Enjoy your delicious pork tenderloin with pineapple-avocado salsa!

d069fb1925.gt:
Cut off the stem of the shiitake mushrooms and cut into bite size pieces.
Put water and the seasoning ingredients in a pot and let it boil.
Then, add the shiitake mushrooms, cover with a drop lid, and cook it for about 10 minutes on low heat.
Stir the pot sometimes.
Take off the drop lid when the liquid boils down and remove from the heat when the liquid has almost gone.
When it has cooled down a little, it is done.
You can keep it in the fridge for about 3 days so make some and keep it for bento lunch box.
It will be an extra dish for dinner if you keep some in the fridge.
d069fb1925.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 180°C (350°F).
2. In a small saucepan, heat the water and bring it to a boil.
3. Add the shiitake mushrooms to the saucepan, and cook for about 5 minutes or until they are tender.
4. Remove the mushrooms from the saucepan and set aside.
5. In a small bowl, mix the soy sauce, mirin, sake, and sugar.
6. Brush the mushrooms with the soy sauce mixture, and then place them in a baking dish.
7. Bake the mushrooms in the preheated oven for about 10-15 minutes, or until they are golden brown and tender.
8. Serve the cooked mushrooms as a side dish or incorporate them into a larger dish, such as a stir-fry or a salad.

[/INST]

[/SYS]

7a20842b45.gt:
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F. In a large bowl using an electric mixer or stand mixer, beat butter and sugar until light and fluffy.
Add eggs, one at a time.
Add vanilla.
In another bowl, sift together the flour, baking powder and salt.
Add the flour mixture and bananas to the butter mixture in the mixer, alternating between the two.
Line each muffin cup with a paper liner.
Fill each muffin cups about 2/3 full with batter and bake for 17-20 minutes until a tester inserted into a cupcake comes out clean.
Remove from the oven and let cool on a wire rack.
Let cupcakes cool completely before frosting.
For the frosting, using an electric mixer or stand mixer, cream butter until light and fluffy.
Add confectioners sugar 1/2 cup at a time, beating well after each addition.
Add vanilla and milk and beat until frosting is well combined.
Add in strawberry preserves 1 tablespoon at a time until frosting is creamy.
Frost cooled cupcakes and store in the refrigerator.
7a20842b45.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the softened butter, sugar, eggs, and vanilla extract.
3. Add the flour, baking powder, and salt, mixing until well combined.
4. Fold in the mashed bananas and butter, softened.
5. In a separate bowl, mix the confectioners sugar, vanilla extract, and milk.
6. Pour the wet mixture over the dry mixture, and mix until just combined.
7. Pour the batter into a greased and floured 9x13 inch baking dish.
8. Bake for 25-30 minutes or until a toothpick inserted in the center comes out clean.
9. Allow the cake to cool for a few minutes before pouring the strawberry preserves over the top.
10. Serve and enjoy your delicious strawberry banana cake.

[/INST]

415a9b7161.gt:
Preheat the oven to 350F and line a 6-cup muffin pan.
Place the butter in a small saucepan over medium heat and cook until the aroma is nutty and the milk solids start to turn brown on the bottom of the pan, about 5 minutes.
With a spatula, transfer the browned butter into a large mixing bowl.
Add the brown and white sugars, eggs and vanilla to the bowl and mix until combined.
Whisk together the flour, ground hazelnuts, baking powder and salt.
Pour the dry ingredients into the browned butter mixture and mix until fully incorporated.
Gently fold in the raspberries.
Spoon the muffin batter into the paper cups.
Scatter the tops with a few of the cracked hazelnuts, while gently pressing them securely into place.
Bake for 15-18 minutes, until a cake tester inserted in the center comes out clean.
Let the muffins cool briefly in the pan, and then place them on a wire rack to cool.
415a9b7161.pred:
To prepare the meal shown in the image, follow these steps:

1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the 1/2 cup of unsalted butter, 1/4 cup of packed light brown sugar, and 1/4 cup granulated cane sugar.
3. Add the eggs one at a time, mixing well after each addition.
4. Gradually add the 2/3 cup of all-purpose flour, and mix until the batter is smooth.
5. Stir in the 1 cup of ground hazelnuts and the 1 1/2 teaspoons of baking powder.
6. In a separate bowl, combine the 1 cup of raspberries and 4-5 hazelnuts, lightly cracked as garnish.
7. Pour the batter into a greased and floured 9-inch (23cm) round cake pan.
8. Bake the cake for 35-40 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean.
9. Remove the cake from the oven and let it cool for 10 minutes.
10. Then, carefully remove the cake from the pan and let it cool completely on a wire rack.
11. Once the cake is fully cooled, use a spatula to spread the raspberry-hazelnut mixture evenly over the top of the cake.
12. Serve the cake with the raspberry-hazelnut garnish on top.

Enjoy your delicious, homemade raspberry-hazelnut cake!

615e73ba74.gt:
The best way to capture the elusive flavor of summertime.
Ben and Jerry prefer small peaches because they have more flavor and less water than the larger ones.
Combine the peaches, 1/2 cup of the sugar, and the lemon juice in a bowl.
Cover and refrigerate for 2 hours, stirring the mixture every 30 minutes.
Remove the peaches from the refrigerator and drain the juice into another bowl.
Return the peaches to the refrigerator.
Whisk the eggs in a mixing bowl until light and fluffy, 1 to 2 minutes.
Whisk in the remaining 3/4 cup sugar, a little at a time, then continue whisking until completely blended, about 1 minute more.
Pour in the cream and milk and whisk to blend.
Add the peach juice and blend.
Transfer the mixture to an ice cream maker and freeze following manufacturer's instructions.
After the ice cream stiffens (about 2 minutes before if is done) add the peaches, then continue freezing until the ice cream is ready.
Makes 1 generous quart.
615e73ba74.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the chopped peaches, sugar, lemon juice, eggs, and whipping cream. Mix well.
3. Gradually add the milk, stirring continuously until the mixture is smooth and well-combined.
4. Pour the mixture into a greased 9x9 inch baking dish.
5. Bake the mixture in the preheated oven for 30-35 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center of the cake comes out clean.
6. Allow the cake to cool for a few minutes before cutting it into squares and serving.

[/SYS]

0a605c19e8.gt:
Add everything but the shrimp to a gallon-sized freezer bag.
Seal the bag and shake well to combine.
Taste test for spiciness; add sriracha for more heat, and tomato paste and olive oil for less heat.
When youre happy with it, add the shrimp and marinate in the fridge for 45 minutes.
Dump the entire bag, marinade included, into a pre-heated frying pan.
Fry the shrimp until theyre curled up and no longer translucent, a couple of minutes on each side.
You can also skewer and grill the shrimp.
Serve over rice, pasta, udon, in lettuce wraps with carrot and sprouts, as an appetizer ...
0a605c19e8.pred:
To cook this dish, first, heat the olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add the minced garlic and cook for about 1 minute, stirring constantly, until fragrant. Then, add the chopped parsley, lemon juice, and Sriracha (or more to taste). Cook for another minute, stirring constantly, until the parsley is wilted.

Next, add the tomato paste, oregano, salt, and pepper to the skillet. Cook for about 2 minutes, stirring constantly, until the tomato paste is melted and the flavors are well combined.

Add the shrimp to the skillet, stirring to coat them evenly with the sauce. Cook the shrimp until they are pink and cooked through, about 2-3 minutes.

Serve the shrimp and sauce over a bed of rice or pasta, and enjoy your delicious and flavorful dish!

2893fcfb35.gt:
Heat a medium skillet over medium-high heat.
Spray with nonstick cooking spray.
Add the diced onion and saute until tender, about 5 minutes.
Add the diced apple and saute until tender, about 3 minutes.
Then remove from heat and set aside for the moment.
In a medium sized mixing bowl, melt the butter (you can do this in the microwave, heating for 30 seconds, stirring, then heating for additional 30 second increments if needed).
Then add the bread crumbs to the melted butter and toss to coat.
Into the bread crumb mixture, mix in the onion and apple.
Add the shredded cheese and mix to thoroughly combine.
Slice the pork chops lengthwise leaving about 1/2 an inch on one side still intact (you are basically making a pocket for the filling mixture).
Stuff pork chops with bread crumb mixture.
Secure the pork chops closed using toothpicks.
Spray each side of the pork chops with nonstick cooking spray and season with salt and pepper.
Grill the pork chops (or cook on a skillet) over medium to medium high heat until the juices run clear, about 20-25 minutes.
Remove from the grill and let rest about 5 minutes.
Remove toothpicks.
Serve and enjoy!
!
2893fcfb35.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. In a large bowl, combine the melted butter, bread crumbs, and shredded cheese. Season the mixture with salt and pepper to taste.
3. Dip each pork chop in the butter mixture, ensuring it is evenly coated.
4. Place the pork chops on a baking sheet and bake in the preheated oven for 20-25 minutes, or until the pork is cooked through and the bread crumbs are golden brown.
5. Serve the pork chops with the cooked apples and onions on the side.

[/SYS]

0ede22d38c.gt:
Chop onion and celery.
Saute celery and onion in vegetable oil in a 2-quart saucepan over medium heat until tender.
Add chicken stock and frozen vegetables.
Cover and cook until vegetables are cooked, about 10 minutes.
If vegetables are too large, you may wish to cut them into smaller pieces.
Stir in cream of chicken soup, chicken and milk and heat through, stirring occasionally.
Cut cheese into chunks and add to soup, stirring until melted.
Taste and season if needed.
(It shouldnt need much if any salt.)
Serve immediately with crackers.
0ede22d38c.pred:
To prepare the meal shown in the image, follow these steps:

1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large pot, heat the vegetable oil over medium heat. Add the onion and celery, and cook until they are softened.
3. Add the chicken stock, and bring the mixture to a boil.
4. Add the frozen cauliflower and broccoli to the pot, and cook until the vegetables are tender.
5. Add the cream of chicken soup, and stir to combine.
6. Reduce the heat to low, and let the soup simmer for about 10 minutes.
7. Add the shredded chicken, and stir to combine.
8. Add the milk, and stir to combine.
9. Season the soup with salt and pepper to taste.
10. Transfer the soup to a large casserole dish, and cover with aluminum foil.
11. Bake the casserole in the preheated oven for about 25-30 minutes, or until the chicken is cooked through and the vegetables are tender.
12. Serve the soup in bowls, garnished with crackers, and enjoy!

[/INST]

dd8991d2f0.gt:
Bring water for noodles to boil in a large pot.
Cook noodles according to instructions on package, then drain and set aside.
In a large skillet, heat olive oil, and then add onion.
Saute onions for 10-15 minutes, over medium-low heat until lightly browned.
Add broccoli and 1/4 cup water.
Cover pan and saute 5 minutes or so until broccoli turns bright green and begins to soften.
Stir in garlic and salt.
Then stir in sesame oil, agave and ume vinegar.
In a small bowl, combine arrowroot and 1 tablespoon water, stirring vigorously to make a paste without any lumps.
Pour the paste over the broccoli and mix quickly and vigorously to loosen any of the mixture that sticks to the bottom of the pan.
Place noodles on individual plates, then top with broccoli mixture.
Garnish with scallions, cilantro and peanuts.
dd8991d2f0.pred:
To recreate the culinary masterpiece in the image, follow these instructions:

1. In a large pot, combine the 6 ounces of mung bean noodles and 3 tablespoons of olive oil. Cook the noodles according to the package instructions until they are tender but still firm.

2. In a small bowl, mix the 1 large onion, diced, with the 1 head of broccoli, chopped into small spears.

3. Add the 14 cup of water to the pot with the cooked noodles. Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce the heat and let it simmer for 10-15 minutes, or until the broccoli is tender.

4. While the noodles and broccoli are cooking, prepare the sauce by mixing the 3 garlic cloves, 12 teaspoon of celtic sea salt, 1 tablespoon of sesame oil, 1 tablespoon of agave nectar, 1 tablespoon of ume vinegar, 1 tablespoon of arrowroot, and 1 tablespoon of water in a small bowl.

5. Once the noodles and broccoli are cooked, add the sauce to the pot and stir to combine. Cook for an additional 2-3 minutes, or until the sauce has thickened slightly.

6. In a small bowl, mix the 14 cup of scallion, thinly sliced, with the 1 tablespoon of cilantro, finely chopped.

7. To serve, divide the cooked noodles and broccoli mixture among four bowls. Top each bowl with a spoonful of the scallion and cilantro mixture.

8. Garnish each bowl with a handful of roasted peanuts, chopped.

Enjoy your delicious and healthy culinary masterpiece!

6902fabddb.gt: Stir salt, pepper, paprika, garlic powder, onion powder, and cayenne pepper in an airtight container, seal, and shake to combine.
6902fabddb.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large bowl, mix together the kosher salt, ground black pepper, paprika, garlic powder, onion powder, and ground red pepper.
3. Season the chicken breasts with the spice mixture, ensuring they are evenly coated.
4. Place the chicken breasts in a baking dish, and bake in the preheated oven for about 30-40 minutes, or until the chicken is cooked through and reaches an internal temperature of 165°F (74°C).
5. Remove the chicken from the oven, and let it rest for a few minutes before slicing it into bite-sized pieces.
6. Serve the chicken with your favorite side dishes, such as rice, potatoes, or a green salad.

[/INST]

e766664a53.gt:
Heat the oven to 450 degrees F with a rack in the middle position.
Take a small slice off of the bottom of each potato so that they will sit flat, and then a small slice (about 1/4) from each end.
Make slices crosswise down the potato at 1/4 intervals, leaving 1/4 at the bottom.
Make sure you do not cut all the way through.
Rinse the sliced potatoes under cold running water, making sure water gets between each slice to wash away excess starch.
Place the potatoes on a plate, bottom side up, and microwave for 5 minutes (do not cover).
Flip the potatoes over, then microwave for another 5 minutes.
While the potatoes are in the microwave, make the topping.
Pulse the bread in a food processor until you have coarsely ground crumbs.
In a medium bowl, use a fork to mix the crumbs with the melted butter, cheddar cheese, Parmesan cheese, paprika, garlic powder, oregano, minced garlic, salt, and pepper until it forms a chunky paste.
Set aside.
When the potatoes are finished in the microwave, place them on a rimmed baking sheet.
Drizzle slowly with olive oil, so that it can run into the slices.
Fan the slices slightly, then dash each one with paprika, garlic powder, oregano, salt, and pepper.
Bake for 30 minutes, until the potatoes are cooked through and the edges are just starting to brown.
Remove from the oven and turn the broiler on.
Press the topping onto the top of the cooked potatoes, pressing into any slices that you easily can, but being careful not to rip the potatoes.
Place under the broiler for a couple of minutes, until the topping is bubbly and starting to brown.
e766664a53.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C).
2. Cut the bread into 1-inch (2.5 cm) cubes.
3. In a large bowl, toss the bread cubes with the melted butter, then transfer them to a baking sheet.
4. In a separate bowl, toss the potatoes with the olive oil, paprika, garlic powder, oregano, salt, pepper, minced garlic, and a pinch of cayenne pepper.
5. Spread the potatoes evenly over the bread cubes on the baking sheet.
6. Bake the bread and potatoes in the preheated oven for 20-25 minutes, or until the bread is golden brown and the potatoes are tender.
7. Remove the baking sheet from the oven, and sprinkle the shredded cheese evenly over the bread and potatoes.
8. Return the baking sheet to the oven, and bake for an additional 5-10 minutes, or until the cheese is melted and bubbly.
9. Remove the baking sheet from the oven, and let it cool for a few minutes before serving.

This cooking guide provides a simple and delicious recipe for a dish featuring bread and potatoes, with added flavor from the seasonings and cheese. The dish can be customized with different types of bread, cheese, or seasonings to suit individual preferences.

84dcc3c2e0.gt:
Combine all the ingredients in a cocktail shaker with a few ice cubes and shake vigorously.
Pour into a chilled cocktail glass and garnish with a wedge of lime.
84dcc3c2e0.pred:
1. In a shaker, combine the fluid Vanilla Vodka, fluid Rum, fluid Midori, fluid Lime Juice, and fluid Pineapple Juice.
2. Shake the mixture vigorously for about 10-15 seconds.
3. Strain the mixture into a glass filled with ice.
4. Garnish the drink with a slice of pineapple and a cherry.

This appetizing cocktail is a delicious and refreshing drink that combines the flavors of vanilla, rum, midori, lime, and pineapple. The shaker method ensures that the ingredients are well-mixed, and the ice in the glass adds a cool and refreshing touch to the drink. The garnish of a slice of pineapple and a cherry adds a touch of color and visual appeal to the presentation.

b240a9e8bb.gt:
Heat oven to 250F degrees.
Mix together cornmeal, flour, sugar, and baking powder.
Combine egg whites, milk and margarine, mix well.
Pour milk mixture into the dry ingredients, stir until just smooth (do not over mix).
In a large non stick skillet heat the 2 tbsp oil, heat until quite hot but not smoking.
Drop in a 1/4 cup of batter for each fritter.
Cook approx 4-6 minutes on each side.
Keep warm in the oven covered with foil until you have cooked all the fritters.
Serve with Blueberries or other fruit.
b240a9e8bb.pred:
[/SYS]

1. Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the cornmeal, flour, sugar, baking powder, and egg whites.
3. Gradually add the skim milk, melted margarine, and vegetable oil, mixing until the batter is smooth.
4. Fold in the canned or fresh blueberries.
5. Pour the batter into a greased 9x9 inch baking dish.
6. Bake for 25-30 minutes or until a toothpick inserted into the center of the cake comes out clean.
7. Allow the cake to cool for a few minutes before cutting it into squares and serving.

[/SYS]

[/SYS]

704ac085bf.gt:
Get the 2 slices of bread and the peanut butter and banana.
Spread the peanut butter on one of the slices of bread.
Slice up as much banna as the bread can fit on it.
Place the two slices of bread together.
And now it is ready to eat.
704ac085bf.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. Grease a baking sheet or a lined baking sheet with cooking spray.
3. Cut the bananas into small pieces.
4. Spread the peanut butter evenly over the bread slices.
5. Place the banana pieces on top of the peanut butter.
6. Place the bread slices with the peanut butter and banana on the prepared baking sheet.
7. Bake the bread for 10-12 minutes, or until the bread is golden brown and the banana pieces are slightly softened.
8. Remove the bread from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes before serving.

[/INST]

These steps will help someone create a delicious and nutritious dish using the ingredients provided in the photo.

1090169845.gt:
Preheat the over to 400F.
Divide the fish into 2 portions placing each in the center of a piece of foil (spraying the foil with some cooking oil is a good idea).
Salt and pepper to taste.
To each portion add pieces of pinched-off-the-stem fresh dill, a splash of lemon juice (or a slice of lemon) and half a pat of butter (optional).
Fold the foil into a packet by folding the edges up until they meet over the center and folding over to seal.
Put the packets in an oven dish and bake for 15 minutes.
Remove and serve.
1090169845.pred:
To cook the New Zealand orange roughy fillet, follow these steps:

1. Preheat your oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. Season the New Zealand orange roughy fillet with salt and pepper, to taste.
3. Heat a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the butter (if using) and cook the fillet for about 3-4 minutes on each side or until it is cooked through.
4. Remove the fillet from the skillet and place it on a baking tray.
5. In a small bowl, mix the lemon juice and dill sprigs. Brush the lemon mixture onto the fillet.
6. Place the fillet in the preheated oven and bake for about 10-12 minutes or until the fish is cooked through and flakes easily with a fork.
7. Remove the fillet from the oven and let it rest for a few minutes before serving.

Enjoy your delicious New Zealand orange roughy fillet with a side of your choice.

b5d5eda997.gt:
Preheat oven to 325F
mix cake in bowl...following the directions on the box.
add jell-o pudding
add strawberry extract
add 1\2 can of strawberry frosting
pour mixture in a floured cake pan.
I used a bundt pan
bake for 35 to 40 minutes or until toothpick comes out clean.
once cake has cooled, take the un-used portion of the frosting and microwave for 10 seconds.
stir and drizzle with spoon over cake
b5d5eda997.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the strawberry extract, strawberry jell-o instant pudding mix, and the box of White cake mix.
3. Add the eggs, oil, and water according to the package instructions. Mix until well combined.
4. Pour the batter into a greased and floured 9x13 inch baking dish.
5. Bake for 25-30 minutes or until a toothpick inserted into the center of the cake comes out clean.
6. Allow the cake to cool for a few minutes before cutting it into equal portions.
7. Dust the cake with powdered sugar, if desired.
8. Spread a layer of strawberry frosting on top of each portion of cake.
9. Enjoy your delicious strawberry cake!

820cb37cdd.gt:
1.
Brown the onion in the olive oil until turning translucent.
Add the garlic.
2.
Add both sausage and beef, break into very small pieces and cook through.
3.
Add spices and seasonings, remove from heat.
Drain and cool.
In a food processor, add ricotta cheese, Parmesan cheese, egg, and the sausage/ground beef mixture.
Process together until it reaches an almost paste-like consistency.
Refrigerate until ready to use.
Can also be frozen.
820cb37cdd.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large skillet, heat 2 tablespoons of olive oil over medium heat. Add the minced garlic and cook for about 1 minute, until fragrant.
3. Add the Italian sausage and cook until browned, breaking it up into smaller pieces as it cooks.
4. Add the ground sirloin and cook until browned, breaking it up into smaller pieces as it cooks.
5. Add the paprika, Italian seasoning, ground fennel, and red pepper flakes to the skillet. Cook for another minute, stirring to combine.
6. Add the ricotta cheese and cook until the cheese is melted and the mixture is smooth.
7. Add the cooked sausage and ground sirloin mixture to the skillet. Stir to combine.
8. Add the egg to the skillet and stir to combine.
9. Pour the mixture into a baking dish and top with the remaining 1 tablespoon of olive oil.
10. Bake the dish in the preheated oven for 25-30 minutes, or until the top is golden brown and the filling is hot and bubbly.
11. Serve the dish hot, garnished with fresh parsley if desired.

[/INST]

b9b1d42894.gt:
Combine first 6 ingredients.
Pour mixture over chicken in slow cooker.
Cook 3-4 hours on low.
Serve with no-yolk egg noodles.
Number of Servings: 4.
b9b1d42894.pred:
To cook the mystery dish, follow these steps:

1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large skillet, cook the bacon bits until crispy. Remove them from the skillet and set aside.
3. In the same skillet, add the chopped garlic and cook until fragrant, about 1 minute.
4. Add the hidden valley ranch dressing mix and stir to combine. Cook for an additional 1-2 minutes.
5. Pour in the cream of chicken soup and stir to combine.
6. Add the skim milk and reduced-fat sour cream, stirring to combine.
7. Place the boneless skinless chicken breasts in a baking dish. Pour the soup mixture over the chicken.
8. Cover the baking dish with aluminum foil and bake for 30-35 minutes, or until the chicken is cooked through and the sauce is bubbly and hot.
9. Remove the foil and let the dish sit for a few minutes before serving.

This dish combines the flavors of bacon, ranch dressing, and chicken, creating a delicious and satisfying meal. Enjoy!

1c2ae05e91.gt:
Cook/steam sliced carrots until fork-tender; drain and keep warm.
Preheat oven to 375.
Lightly grease/spray a 2 1/2 qt casserole dish; set aside.
In a mixing bowl, combine the melted butter, onion, cheese soup, milk, egg, cheese, crushed crackers, salt, pepper, tarragon and nutmeg; mix well.
Gently fold in the hot cooked carrots to the mixture.
Turn mixture into prepared casserole dish.
Bake, uncovered at 375 for 25-30 minutes.
1c2ae05e91.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the sliced carrots, melted butter, minced onion, cheddar cheese soup, low-fat milk, beaten egg, and shredded cheddar cheese. Mix well.
3. Add the crushed crackers, salt, pepper, and tarragon to the mixture. Stir to combine.
4. Pour the mixture into a 9x13 inch baking dish.
5. Bake the casserole in the preheated oven for 25-30 minutes, or until the edges are golden brown and the center is hot and bubbly.
6. Remove the casserole from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes before serving.

[/INST]

8dfa9a04cc.gt:
In shallow bowl, mix flour, egg, vanilla, milk, and lemon jce.
Dip rings to cover.
In deep skillet heat oil to about 375*.
Fry rings, in batches of 3 or 4 for 2 1/2 minutes or until golden brown.
Place on paper towels and dust with sugar on both sides.
8dfa9a04cc.pred:
1. In a large bowl, combine the flour, beaten egg, and vanilla.
2. Gradually add the milk, stirring constantly, until the mixture reaches the desired consistency.
3. Stir in the lemon juice and mix well.
4. Add the peeled, cored, and cut apples to the mixture.
5. Pour the batter into a greased and floured frying pan.
6. Cook the batter over medium heat until the edges are set and the center is still slightly wet.
7. Flip the pancakes and cook for an additional minute.
8. Serve the pancakes with confectioners' sugar.

[/INST]

8c25573d0e.gt:
In a mixing bowl, cream butter and sugar until fluffy.
Beat in flour.
Cover and refrigerate for 1 hour.
Roll out onto a well-floured surface to 1/4-in.
thickness.
Brush lightly with egg.
Sprinkle with almonds and sugar if desired.
Using a fluted pastry cutter or knife, cut into 2-in.
x 1-in.
strips.
Place 1 inches apart on ungreased baking sheets.
Bake at 350 degrees F for 10-12 minute or until lightly browned.
Cool on wire racks.
8c25573d0e.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the softened butter, sugar, and egg. Mix until well combined.
3. Gradually add the flour, mixing until a dough forms. If the dough is too dry, add a little more water, and if it is too sticky, add a little more flour.
4. Roll the dough out on a floured surface to a thickness of about 1/4 inch (0.6 cm).
5. Cut the dough into desired shapes using cookie cutters or a sharp knife.
6. Place the shaped dough on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper or a silicone mat.
7. Bake the cookies for 10-12 minutes, or until they are golden brown.
8. Allow the cookies to cool on the baking sheet for a few minutes before transferring them to a wire rack to cool completely.
9. Once the cookies are completely cooled, decorate them with colored crystal sugar, if desired.

[/INST]

These steps will help someone create delicious, homemade almond cookies using the ingredients provided in the photo. The cookies are easy to make and can be customized with various decorations or flavors to suit individual preferences.

87f97ac544.gt:
Preheat oven to 350A.
Slice ham in half.
If using slices of cheese, cut in quarters.
Roll desired amount of ham and cheese up in each biscuit.
Use toothpick to hold in place.
Bake 15 minutes or until golden brown.
Feel free to stuff these with almost anything!
Little smokies sausages with cheese and a tsp of chili; slices of pepperoni with mozzarella and a tsp of pizza sauce or marinara, etc.
87f97ac544.pred:
To recreate the culinary masterpiece in the image, follow these steps:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. Crush the biscuits into crumbs using a rolling pin or your hands.
3. In a bowl, mix the crushed biscuits with melted butter until well combined.
4. Press the biscuit mixture onto the bottom and up the sides of a 9-inch (23cm) springform pan.
5. Bake the crust for 10-12 minutes, or until it is set and lightly golden.
6. Remove the crust from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes.
7. While the crust is cooling, prepare the filling by combining the thin slices of ham, cheese, and any desired seasonings or herbs.
8. Pour the filling mixture over the cooled crust and smooth it out evenly.
9. Return the springform pan to the oven and bake for 20-25 minutes, or until the filling is hot and the cheese is melted and bubbly.
10. Allow the cheesecake to cool for a few minutes, then transfer it to the refrigerator to chill for at least 2 hours or overnight.
11. Once the cheesecake is fully chilled, remove it from the springform pan and transfer it to a serving plate.
12. Serve the cheesecake immediately, and enjoy your culinary masterpiece!

[/INST]

b188749dcd.gt:
Combine fennel seeds, cumin seeds, caraway seeds, cracked wheat, butter or margarine, molasses or barley malt, and orange zest in 1 1/3 cup of boiling water.
Soak for 1 hour.
(This pre-soaks the cracked wheat and pre-releases the other flavors.)
Add seed mixture along with baking soda, whole wheat or rye flour, high-gluten bread flour, dry yeast, gluten, and buttermilk powder into the pan of a bread machine in the order suggested by the manufacturer.
Select the cycle for White Bread and the Light Crust setting.
Start.
b188749dcd.pred:
1. In a large bowl, combine the boiling water, fennel seed, cumin seeds, caraway seed, cracked wheat, and butter. Allow the mixture to cool for a few minutes.

2. Add the molasses, orange zest, baking soda, rye flour, bread flour, active dry yeast, and gluten flour to the bowl. Mix well to combine all the ingredients.

3. Gradually add the powdered buttermilk, stirring until the dough comes together. If the dough is too dry, add a bit more water, and if it's too sticky, add a bit more flour.

4. Knead the dough on a floured surface until it becomes smooth and elastic, about 10-15 minutes.

5. Place the dough in a lightly oiled bowl, cover it with a clean cloth, and let it rise in a warm place for about 1-2 hours, or until it has doubled in size.

6. Preheat your oven to 375°F (190°C).

7. Punch down the dough, and then shape it into a ball. Place it on a lightly floured surface, and roll it out to a thickness of about 1/2 inch (1.5 cm).

8. Transfer the rolled-out dough to a baking sheet, and cut it into desired shapes or sizes.

9. Bake the bread in the preheated oven for about 20-25 minutes, or until it is golden brown and sounds hollow when tapped.

10. Remove the bread from the oven, and let it cool on a wire rack for a few minutes before serving.

Enjoy your delicious homemade bread!

adf0775fd4.gt:
Bring a large saucepan of salted water to a boil.
Fill a large bowl with ice water.
In another large bowl, whisk the shallot, vinegar and sour cream together.
Whisk in the olive oil until emulsified.
Season with salt and pepper.
Add the sugar snap peas to the boiling water and blanch for 20 seconds.
Add the snow peas and cook for 20 seconds.
Add the frozen baby peas and cook for 20 seconds longer, until the sugar snaps and snow peas are crisp-tender and the baby peas are heated through.
Drain and immediately transfer the colander to the ice water to stop the cooking.
Drain again and pat the peas dry.
Add the peas to the dressing, season with salt and pepper and toss to coat.
Serve.
adf0775fd4.pred:
To recreate the culinary masterpiece in the image, follow these instructions:

1. In a small bowl, mix together the minced shallot, sherry vinegar, sour cream or creme fraiche, and extra-virgin olive oil. Season with salt and freshly ground pepper to taste.
2. In a large skillet or wok, heat the olive oil over medium heat. Add the sugar snap peas and snow peas, and cook until they are tender but still crisp.
3. Add the frozen baby peas to the skillet, and cook until they are heated through.
4. Pour the dressing mixture over the vegetables, and stir to combine. Cook for an additional minute or two, until the vegetables are heated through and the dressing is slightly coated.
5. Serve the dish immediately, and enjoy the delicious and visually appealing culinary masterpiece.

1296229d55.gt:
Pick your favorite way of preparing meat.
I sliced a thick steak and put this in a foil pouch.
This would work well in a pressure cooker, too.
Place meat, sauces, seasoning and sugar together.
Adjust the amounts to your preferences.
The sugar makes the meat more tender and is perfect for tough cuts.
Cook until meat is done.
Add feta cheese and cover to let cheese melt.
Serve with pasta, rice or potatoes and don't plan on leftovers!
1296229d55.pred:
To prepare the meal shown in the image, follow these steps:

1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large skillet, heat oil over medium heat. Add the beef and cook until browned on all sides, about 5-7 minutes.
3. Remove the beef from the skillet and set aside.
4. In the same skillet, add the steak sauce, Worcestershire sauce, and steak seasoning. Stir to combine.
5. Return the beef to the skillet and stir to coat the beef with the sauce mixture.
6. Add the sugar and stir to combine.
7. Cook the beef in the skillet for 5-7 minutes, or until the sauce has thickened and the beef is cooked through.
8. Transfer the beef to a baking dish and top with the feta cheese.
9. Bake the beef and feta cheese in the preheated oven for 10-15 minutes, or until the cheese is melted and bubbly.
10. Serve the beef and cheese over rice or noodles, and enjoy your delicious meal.

[/INST]

4f880f7c86.gt:
Add the kinako and sugar to a bowl and combine well.
Then add the soy milk (or milk) to the bowl as well and cream everything together with a rubber spatula.
If the mixture is too dry, try adding some more milk.
Once mixed, wrap it in some cling film and squeeze and shape the mixture together with your hands so that the mixture forms a ball.
Once the mixture has reached a consistency where it can be shaped into a ball with your bare hands, shape the mixture into whatever shapes you like I usually roll mine out with a rolling pan over the cling film then slice it into pieces.
You can replace the sugar with brown sugar if you like.
Feel free to sprinkle the kinako truffles with kinako powder, cinnamon, or anything that comes to mind at the end as well.
4f880f7c86.pred:
[INST] <<SYS>>
To make a delicious Kinako and Sugar (or brown sugar) smoothie, follow these steps:
1. In a blender, combine 50 grams of Kinako, 15 grams of sugar (or brown sugar), and 5 tablespoons of soy milk (or milk).
2. Blend the mixture until it reaches the desired consistency, which should be smooth and creamy.
3. Pour the smoothie into a glass and enjoy your refreshing and nutritious drink.

[/INST]

68d4e3063b.gt:
Preheat oven to 400F
Clean wing sections, salt and pepper, I stay light on the salt because the sauce adds some also.
Spread wings out on baking sheet, place in preheated oven for about 45 minutes.
About 5 minutes before the wings are done, in a small container (I use a coffee mug) mix the sauce ingredients.
I put a little sauce in a big enough bowl to hold the wings and mix them.
Add about 1/3 wings, about 1/3 sauce, same thing twice more.
I find that just makes it easier to evenly coat the wings.
If you want to add a little chart to the coating, you can broil the wings for a minute per side, keep an eye on them do you don't over do it.
My daughter does not like it that way, so we skip this step when she is home.
Serve immediately.
68d4e3063b.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large bowl, toss the wing sections with the ground black pepper, salt, and sesame oil.
3. In a separate bowl, mix the ranch dressing and BBQ sauce.
4. Place the wing sections on a baking sheet and bake for 30-40 minutes, or until they are cooked through and the meat is no longer pink.
5. While the wings are baking, toss the cooked wings in the ranch dressing mixture.
6. Serve the wings with the BBQ sauce on the side for dipping.

This appetizing meal is ready to be enjoyed. The combination of the crispy, cooked wings and the tangy, smoky BBQ sauce creates a delicious and satisfying dish.

c813791325.gt:
In a food processor, combine the garlic and cucumber and process until finely minced.
Add the yogurt, sour cream, lemon juice, dill and salt and pepper to taste.
Process until well blended, then transfer to a bowl.
Taste to adjust the seasonings if needed.
Cover and refrigerate until needed (recipe yields 1 cup).
c813791325.pred:
[INST] <<SYS>>
To make the dish, start by preheating your oven to 400°F (200°C).

1. In a large bowl, mix the crushed garlic, peeled and seeded cucumber, vegan yogurt, vegan sour cream, lemon juice, dill, mint, and pepper.
2. Season the eggplant slices with salt and pepper.
3. In a separate bowl, mix the flour, salt, pepper, and cayenne.
4. Dip the eggplant slices in the egg and then coat them with the flour mixture.
5. Heat some oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add the eggplant slices and cook until they are golden brown on both sides.
6. Transfer the cooked eggplant slices to a baking sheet and bake in the preheated oven for 10-15 minutes, or until they are tender and cooked through.
7. In a small bowl, mix the ground flaxseed with water and blend until it reaches a thick consistency.
8. In another bowl, mix the dry bread crumbs, nutritional yeast, oregano, basil, smoked paprika, and tzatziki sauce.
9. Once the eggplant is cooked, transfer it to a serving dish and top it with the bread crumb mixture.
10. Bake the dish in the preheated oven for an additional 5-10 minutes, or until the bread crumbs are golden brown and crispy.

Enjoy your delicious eggplant dish!

91462bb341.gt:
Preheat oven to 400.
Combine bread crumbs, Italian seasoning and garlic powder in shallow dish.
Dip chicken in egg, then crumb mixture; turn to coat.
Arrange chicken in 13 x 9-inch baking dish.
Bake 20 minutes.
Pour Sauce over chicken; top with cheese.
Bake an additional 10 minutes or until chicken is thoroughly cooked.
Serve over spaghetti.
91462bb341.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. In a large bowl, combine the breadcrumbs, Italian seasoning, and garlic powder.
3. Season the chicken breast halves with salt and pepper.
4. Dip the chicken breast halves into the egg, then coat them with the breadcrumb mixture.
5. Place the breaded chicken on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper or a silicone mat.
6. Bake the chicken in the preheated oven for 15-20 minutes, or until it is cooked through and the breading is golden brown.
7. Meanwhile, heat the Ragu tomato sauce in a saucepan over medium heat.
8. Once the chicken is cooked, remove it from the oven and let it rest for a few minutes.
9. Pour the heated sauce over the chicken and toss to coat it evenly.
10. Sprinkle the shredded part-skim mozzarella cheese over the chicken and sauce.
11. Return the chicken and sauce to the oven and bake for an additional 5-10 minutes, or until the cheese is melted and bubbly.
12. Serve the chicken Parmesan over a bed of pasta or your favorite side dish.

[/INST]

88e444eb93.gt:
Preheat oven to broil.
Line a baking sheet with foil.
Halve the green bell pepper, red bell pepper, jalapeno peppers, and serrano peppers lengthwise and discard stems and seeds.
Place on baking sheet and brush the peppers with olive oil.
Roast peppers under the broiler until the skin blackens and blisters, 3 to 5 minutes.
Place peppers in a bowl and cover with plastic wrap; allow the peppers to steam until the skins loosen, about 10 minutes.
Peel skin off the peppers and discard.
Combine the green bell pepper, red bell pepper, jalapenos, serrano, onion, tomato, garlic, cilantro, diced tomato with juice, lime juice, salt, black pepper, and beer in a blender.
Blend to desired consistency.
Transfer to a bowl and allow to cool in the refrigerator for 30 minutes before serving.
88e444eb93.pred:
To cook the mystery dish, follow these steps:

1. Heat the olive oil in a large skillet or frying pan over medium heat.
2. Add the chopped onion and cook until softened, about 5 minutes.
3. Add the minced garlic and cook for another minute, until fragrant.
4. Add the green and red bell peppers, serrano peppers, and jalapeno peppers to the skillet. Cook for a few minutes, stirring occasionally, until the vegetables are slightly softened.
5. Pour in the canned diced tomatoes with their juice, along with the fresh lime juice, salt, and pepper. Stir to combine.
6. Reduce the heat to low and let the mixture simmer for about 10-15 minutes, stirring occasionally.
7. Serve the dish hot, garnished with a sprinkle of cilantro leaves.

Enjoy your delicious, spicy Mexican dish!

a0b7c1096b.gt:
Strain plums through a sieve over a bowl, reserving juice.
Cut plums in half; discard pits.
Combine plums, reserved juice, red wine, honey, cinnamon, and cloves in a medium saucepan.
Bring to a boil.
Cover; reduce heat, and simmer 15 minutes.
Place half of soup in a blender; process until smooth.
Pour into a bowl.
Repeat procedure with other half of soup.
Stir in liqueur and rind.
Place 3/4 cup soup into each of 6 wine goblets.
Top each serving with 1 tablespoon yogurt and 1 mint sprig, if desired.
a0b7c1096b.pred:
1. In a large saucepan, combine the two cans of plums in light syrup, undrained.
2. Add the dry red wine, honey, ground cinnamon, ground cloves, Cointreau or orange-flavored liqueur, and grated lemon rind.
3. Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce the heat and let it simmer for about 15-20 minutes, or until the plums are tender and the sauce has thickened slightly.
4. Remove the saucepan from the heat and stir in the vanilla low-fat yogurt.
5. If desired, garnish the dish with a sprig of mint.
6. Serve the plum sauce over the cooked chicken or pork, or use it as a topping for ice cream or other desserts.

[/SYS]

27dd242a7a.gt:
Mix first 6 ingredients together and place in an oven proof casserole dish.
Sprinkle cheese on top and bake for 15 to 20 minutes at 350.
Serve hot over chips,this isn't very good cold.
27dd242a7a.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the cream cheese, sour cream, and frito bean dip.
3. Add the Tabasco sauce, salt, and chopped green onion. Mix well.
4. Spread the mixture evenly over the tortillas or corn chips.
5. Top with the shredded monterey jack and cheddar cheese.
6. Bake the cheese-covered tortillas or corn chips in the preheated oven for 10-15 minutes, or until the cheese is melted and bubbly.
7. Remove from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes.
8. Cut the cheesy tortillas or corn chips into bite-sized pieces and serve.

Enjoy your delicious and flavorful cheesy tortilla or corn chip dish!

8b290d6b5c.gt:
Preheat oven to 330 degrees F (165C).
Butter and flour a 10 inch bundt pan.
Combine flour, baking powder, soda, cinnamon, nutmeg and salt.
In large bowl, cream butter with sugar until light and fluffy (no less than 6 minutes).
Add eggs; beat until smooth.
Add flour mixture alternately with yoghurt (or sour cream); beat until smooth.
Pour batter into prepared pan.
Bake about 1 hour, or until tester comes out with a few moist crumbs attached.
Preheat broiler.
Combine brown sugar, butter, almonds, coconut, milk and vanilla.
Spoon mixture over top of cake.
Place under broiler, 3 inches from heat source until lightly browned.
WATCH VERY CAREFULLY as this can go from caramelly to burned in no time!
8b290d6b5c.pred:
To prepare the meal shown in the image, follow these steps:

1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the flour, baking powder, baking soda, cinnamon, nutmeg, and salt.
3. In a separate bowl, cream the softened butter and sugar until light and fluffy. Add the Greek yogurt (or sour cream) and mix until well combined.
4. Add the eggs one at a time, mixing well after each addition.
5. Gradually add the dry ingredients to the wet ingredients, mixing until just combined.
6. Stir in the melted butter and chopped toasted almonds.
7. Pour the batter into a greased and floured 9x13 inch baking dish.
8. Bake for 25-30 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center of the cake comes out clean.
9. Allow the cake to cool in the pan for a few minutes before transferring it to a wire rack to cool completely.

Enjoy your delicious cake!

0349f80c73.gt:
Mix all ingredients (using a hand mixer will get the lumps out).
Chill.
Serve!
0349f80c73.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (180°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the cream cheese, sour cream, and vegetable soup mix.
3. Add the thawed and drained spinach, and mix until well combined.
4. Season the mixture with salt and pepper to taste.
5. Transfer the mixture to a baking dish.
6. Bake the mixture in the preheated oven for about 25-30 minutes, or until the edges are slightly golden and the center is set.
7. Remove the dish from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes before serving.

[/INST]

3a73e25c27.gt:
Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C).
Crumble the sausage into a saucepan over low heat; cover and cook until sausage is completely browned, stirring every 30 seconds; drain.
Place the bread on a baking sheet with the crust sides down.
Arrange the cooked sausage evenly over both halves of bread.
Top each with tomato slices, red bell pepper strips, mozzarella slices, green olives, and black olives.
Bake in preheated oven for 10 minutes.
Whisk together the olive oil, balsamic vinegar, oregano, basil, salt, pepper, onion, and garlic in a bowl.
Drizzle over baked bread halves.
Bake another 5 minutes.
Cut into 2 inch slices to serve.
3a73e25c27.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large skillet, cook the sausage over medium heat until browned, breaking it into smaller pieces as it cooks.
3. Remove the sausage from the skillet and set aside.
4. In the same skillet, add the beefsteak tomato, roasted red bell pepper strips, and onion. Cook until the vegetables are tender.
5. In a large mixing bowl, combine the cooked sausage, mozzarella cheese, black and green olives, olive oil, balsamic vinegar, oregano, basil, salt, and pepper.
6. Add the cooked vegetables to the bowl and mix well.
7. Spread the mixture evenly over the cut-in-half Italian bread slices.
8. Bake the sandwiches in the preheated oven for 10-12 minutes, or until the bread is golden brown and the cheese is melted and bubbly.
9. Serve the sandwiches warm.

[/INST]

68fde60a06.gt:
In Dutch oven, place beef, onion, garlic, salt and pepper.
Combine water and tomato paste; pour over beef mixture.
Bring to a boil; reduce heat to low.
Cover tightly and simmer 1 3/4 to 2 hours or until beef is tender.
Remove beef from cooking liquid; cool slightly.
Meanwhile skim fat from cooking liquid, if necessary.
Trim and discard excess fat from cooked beef.
Shred beef with 2 forks.
In Dutch oven, combine 2 cups cooking liquid, steak sauce, brown sugar and cornstarch mixture.
Bring to a boil; cook and stir 1 to 2 minutes or until slightly thickened.
Add shredded beef; mix well.
Continue to cook until thoroughly heated, stirring occasionally.
Place equal amounts of beef mixture on bottom half of each bun.

acfdff90be.gt:

Put the chicken and all the ingredients up to the soy sauce and honey in a bowl and rub in well with your hands.

That way the batter will stick well to the chicken.
To make the batter: Put the panko in a resealable bag and crush into a fine powder by rolling a rolling pin over the bag.
You can also do this in a food mill or food processor.
Put the crushed panko and the remaining ingredients marked with in a bowl and mix to combine.
Add 250 ml of beer and mix until blended.
The batter should be about the consistency of heavy cream.
If it's too thick add a little more beer, mixing between additions.
Pour cooking oil in a frying pan and heat over medium to about 170C.
Coat each piece of chicken in batter and deep fry.
To avoid the batter from cracking and falling off, turn the pieces over gently after about 30 seconds even if the surface has not hardened.
When the pieces are golden brown, take them out and drain off the oil very well to finish.

a87b593bc7.gt:
Set oven to 325 degrees.
Prepare an ungreased 10-inch tube pan.
In a large bowl, sift together flour, baking powder and salt, then sift one more time, then beat in oil, egg YOLKS, 1/4 cup plus 3 tablespoons lemon juice, water and lemon peel with an electric mixer at low speed for about 3 minutes.

Run a knife around the edges of the pan to loosen cake.
Transfer the cake to a serving plate.
Dust with powdered sugar.

and butter a large baking sheet.
