fdb9200291.gt:
start by heating a large skillet with butter, garlic & olive oil cook on med heat about 1 minute add in diced serrano chili cook another minute.
add in shrimp & chopped lobster and all seasonings along with chili paste.
Cook 6-7 minutes till shrimp are nice & pink.
This is a spicy dish Enjoy!
fdb9200291.pred:
To cook the mystery dish, follow these steps:

1. In a large skillet or wok, heat the olive oil over medium heat.
2. Add the minced garlic and cook for about 1 minute, stirring constantly, until fragrant.
3. Add the chili paste and cook for another minute, stirring constantly.
4. Add the precooked chopped lobster tail, McCormick hot shot black & red seasoning, course ground black pepper, and garlic salt. Cook for about 2 minutes, stirring occasionally.
5. Add the serrano chili and cook for another minute, stirring occasionally.
6. Add the cleaned and deveined shrimp to the skillet, stirring to combine with the lobster. Cook for about 3 minutes, or until the shrimp are cooked through and the sauce has thickened slightly.
7. Serve the dish over rice or noodles, and enjoy!

[/INST]

fc990de78b.gt:
Cut leeks diagonally into thirds and then diagonally in half to form 6 triangular pieces from each leek.
Rinse under cold water; drain.
Melt margarine in a heavy skillet; add leeks.
Cook until lightly browned, stirring gently, approx 15 minutes.
Stir in the broth cover and simmer for 30 minutes or until golden and the broth has mostly evaporated.
fc990de78b.pred:
To cook the mystery dish, follow these steps:
1. In a large pot or Dutch oven, heat the margarine or butter over medium heat.
2. Add the leeks and cook until they are softened and slightly browned, stirring occasionally.
3. Pour in the chicken broth, and bring the mixture to a simmer.
4. Season the soup with salt to taste.
5. Cover the pot, and let the soup simmer for about 20-25 minutes, or until the leeks are tender and the flavors have melded together.
6. Serve the soup hot, and enjoy your delicious mystery dish.

[/INST]

7106d13160.gt:
preheat oven to 350
cream together brown sugar, butter, milk and eggs
mix in bisquick
in pieces add bananas 1 at a time until incorporated
pour batter into greased bread pan or baking dish of choice (i use an 8x10 casserole because i dont have a bread pan)
bake at 350 for 45-55 minutes
remove from oven, cool for 5 minutes for easier removal from pan
7106d13160.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the brown sugar, melted butter, and milk. Whisk until smooth.
3. Add the eggs to the mixture and whisk until well combined.
4. Stir in the ripe bananas and bisquick until a smooth batter forms.
5. Pour the batter into a greased 9x9 inch baking dish.
6. Bake the cake in the preheated oven for 25-30 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean.
7. Allow the cake to cool for a few minutes before cutting it into squares and serving.

[/SYS]

1ce32e6812.gt:
Toss lettuce with croutons and bacon in large bowl.
Add dressing and cheese; mix lightly.
Serve with lemon wedges.
1ce32e6812.pred:
1. First, gather the necessary ingredients: 3 cups tightly packed torn romaine lettuce, 1 cup whole wheat croutons, 2 slices cooked turkey bacon, chopped, 1/4 cup Kraft Creamy Caesar Dressing, 2 Tbsp. Kraft 100% Parmesan Light Grated Cheese, and a lemon, cut into 8 wedges.

2. Wash and dry the lettuce thoroughly.

3. In a large bowl, combine the torn romaine lettuce, whole wheat croutons, and chopped cooked turkey bacon.

4. In a small bowl, mix the Kraft Creamy Caesar Dressing and the 100% Parmesan Light Grated Cheese.

5. Add the dressing mixture to the large bowl with the lettuce and croutons, tossing to coat the ingredients evenly.

6. Cut the lemon into wedges and serve the salad alongside the dressing for dipping.

7. Enjoy your homemade Caesar salad!

92214874b7.gt:
Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C).
Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.
Cook lasagna in the boiling water, stirring occasionally until cooked through but firm to the bite, about 8 minutes.
Drain.
Melt butter in a saucepan over medium heat; stir cream cheese into hot butter until it begins to melt, about 5 minutes.
Season with salt, onion powder, and black pepper.
Whisk warm milk gradually into cream cheese until smooth; stir in 1 1/2 cup Swiss cheese.
Bring sauce to a simmer, stirring constantly, until cheese has melted and sauce has thickened, 5 to 10 minutes.
Remove from heat.
Spread 3/4 cup of cheese sauce into bottom of a 9x9-inch baking dish.
Arrange 1/3 of the lasagna noodles over the sauce and spread half the cooked chicken and half the ham over the noodles.
Pour 1 cup sauce over chicken and ham.
Repeat layers starting with half the remaining lasagna noodles, remaining chicken, remaining ham, and 1 more cup of cheese sauce.
Finish by layering remaining lasagna noodles, remaining sauce, 1/2 cup Swiss cheese, and bread crumbs; sprinkle top with Italian seasoning.
Cover dish with aluminum foil.
Bake in the preheated oven until casserole is bubbling, about 25 minutes.
Remove foil and continue to bake until crumbs are browned, about 10 more minutes.
Let casserole stand 5 to 10 minutes before serving.
92214874b7.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large bowl, combine the noodles, butter, cream cheese, salt, onion powder, and black pepper. Mix well.
3. Spread the mixture evenly over the bottom of a 9x13 inch baking dish.
4. In a separate bowl, whisk the warm milk, chicken, ham, Swiss cheese, Italian seasoning, and bread crumbs.
5. Pour the chicken and ham mixture over the noodle mixture in the baking dish.
6. Bake for 25-30 minutes, or until the lasagna is hot and bubbly, and the cheese is melted and bubbly.
7. Allow the lasagna to cool for a few minutes before slicing and serving.

Enjoy your delicious homemade lasagna!

24452e5a07.gt:
Stir the cream cheese, sour cream, jalapeno pepper, salsa verde, red salsa, onion, lime juice, and chili powder seasoning together in a bowl until well blended.
Cover and refrigerate for 1 hour before serving.
24452e5a07.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the cream cheese and sour cream.
3. Add the minced jalapeno pepper and mix well.
4. Add the salsa verde and red salsa, mixing until well combined.
5. Add the minced onion and fresh lime juice, mixing until well combined.
6. Season the mixture with Mexican-style chili powder with lime, and mix well.
7. Transfer the mixture to a baking dish and bake for about 20-25 minutes or until the edges are bubbly and the center is set.
8. Remove the dish from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes.
9. Serve the dip with tortilla chips or pita chips, and enjoy!

[/INST]

fec819225d.gt:
Bring the orange juice, soy sauce, chicken stock, and orange zest to a boil in a saucepan.
Reduce heat to medium-low and simmer until the sauce has reduced to half of its original volume, about 30 minutes.
fec819225d.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a small bowl, mix the soy sauce, chicken broth, and grated orange zest.
3. In a large bowl, toss the cooked chicken with the sauce mixture.
4. Arrange the chicken in a single layer on a baking sheet.
5. Roast the chicken in the preheated oven for about 25-30 minutes, or until it is cooked through and the internal temperature reaches 165°F (74°C).
6. Remove the chicken from the oven and let it rest for a few minutes before slicing it into bite-sized pieces.
7. Serve the chicken with the sauce on the side for dipping.

[/INST]

[INST]<<SYS>>
The steps for cooking the dish displayed in the photo involve preheating the oven, mixing the sauce, tossing the cooked chicken with the sauce, arranging the chicken on a baking sheet, roasting the chicken, resting the chicken, and serving it with the sauce on the side.

a7cd3b464c.gt:
Heat oil in large saucepan or Dutch oven.
Add garlic, ginger, lemon peel and hot pepper flakes.
Cook gently until very fragrant.
Add broth, soy sauce and lemon juice and bring to boil.
Add carrots.
Reduce heat and simmer gently for 15 minutes.
Add scallops, shrimp, sesame oil and green onions, Cook for just a few minutes, or until seafood is barely cooked.
Serve sprinkled with cilantro.
a7cd3b464c.pred:
To cook the mystery dish, follow these steps:

1. In a large pot, heat the olive oil over medium heat. Add the minced garlic and gingerroot, and cook for 1-2 minutes, stirring occasionally, until fragrant.
2. Add the lemon peel, dried red pepper flakes, and chicken broth. Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce the heat to low and simmer for 10-15 minutes, stirring occasionally.
3. Add the low sodium soy sauce and lemon juice, and stir to combine. Simmer for an additional 5-10 minutes, or until the sauce has thickened slightly.
4. Add the diced carrots, scallops, and shrimp to the pot. Cook for 5-7 minutes, or until the seafood is cooked through and the vegetables are tender.
5. Stir in the sesame oil, green onions, and cilantro. Cook for an additional 1-2 minutes, or until the ingredients are heated through.
6. Serve the dish over rice or noodles, and enjoy!

This dish combines the flavors of soy sauce, lemon, and ginger, along with the natural sweetness of the carrots and seafood. The sesame oil adds a rich, nutty taste, while the green onions and cilantro provide a fresh, herbal touch. The dish is both delicious and visually appealing, making it a great choice for a meal or a special occasion.

12f49a25e6.gt:
Take the meat out of the fridge at least 30 minutes before cooking and pound it to tenderize.
Use your hands to re-shape the meat back into it's original thickness and season with salt and pepper.
In a pan that is hot enough to cause the beef fat to smoke, cook one side of the meat on a strong heat until browned.
Flip it over and cook the other side for 1 minute.
Then flip over again and cook for another 1 minute to finish.
Pour over your choice of sauce and serve.
I recommend this steak sauce,.
By the way, this is the dinner that I made for my husband's birthday.
12f49a25e6.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. Season the beef with salt and pepper on all sides.
3. Heat the beef tallow (or vegetable oil or butter) in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Once hot, sear the beef on all sides until browned.
4. Remove the beef from the skillet and place it in a roasting pan.
5. Pour the sauce of your choice over the beef.
6. Roast the beef in the oven for about 1-1.5 hours, or until it reaches your desired level of doneness.
7. Remove the beef from the oven and let it rest for a few minutes before slicing it into your desired portions.
8. Serve the beef with the sauce on the side, if desired.

[/SYS]

0979acfd51.gt:
Slice the sausages diagonally.
Heat the oil in a pan, and fry the sausage until browned.
Sprinkle on a generous amount of cracked black pepper.
The sausages are done when they are close to becoming burnt.
If you have the time, top them with a sunny-side-up egg.
The creaminess of the egg yolk is divine.
0979acfd51.pred:
To cook the dish, follow these steps:

1. Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. In a small bowl, mix the cracked black pepper with a little bit of oil to create a peppercorn crust.
3. Cut the fish sausages into bite-sized pieces.
4. In a large skillet, heat the remaining oil over medium heat. Add the fish sausages and cook until they are golden brown on all sides, about 5-7 minutes.
5. Remove the fish sausages from the skillet and place them on a baking sheet.
6. Drizzle the peppercorn crust mixture over the fish sausages, ensuring they are evenly coated.
7. Place the baking sheet in the preheated oven and cook for 10-12 minutes, or until the fish sausages are cooked through and the crust is golden brown.
8. Serve the cooked fish sausages over a bed of rice or noodles, and enjoy your delicious meal.

[/SYS]

73d8122a4e.gt:
In food processor, mix all ingredients until you have a lumpy paste.
Put in a saucepan (I used a small saucepan and it was perfect).
Bring to boil and let simmer slowly about 15 minutes.
Add salt to taste.
Pour in a jar and let cool.
It's good up to one month in the fridge.
73d8122a4e.pred:
[/SYS]

[INST] <<SYS>>
To prepare the unidentified dish, follow these steps:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large bowl, combine the diced red bell pepper, sliced long hot red pepper, and minced garlic.
3. In a separate bowl, mix together the sugar, salt, and white vinegar.
4. Pour the vinegar mixture over the vegetables and garlic, and toss to coat evenly.
5. Transfer the mixture to a baking dish, and bake in the preheated oven for 30-40 minutes, or until the vegetables are tender and the liquid has evaporated.
6. Serve the dish hot, and enjoy your delicious, homemade dish.

[/SYS]

[/INST]

4368d128b9.gt:
Brown the ground beef using the seasonings i have listed to flavor the meat.
(I usually add these seasonings to taste since i rarely measure them, so the measurements i have listed are a guideline) Add 1/4 cup of water and let meat and seasonings simmer until liquid is mostly cooked off.
You don't want it soupy.
Drain on paper toweling.
Clean lettuce, tear into bite sized pieces.
Toss with all of the rest of the ingredients adding about 1/2 cup of the dressing and tossing again well.
Serve with salsa and sour cream on the side if desired.
I list Doritos here because, let's face it, they're good!
But when I have time, i like to cut up corn tortillas into wedges, fry in a bit of oil, and season with Mexican style spices.
4368d128b9.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large skillet, cook the ground beef over medium heat until it is browned and cooked through. Season the beef with chili powder, cumin, Mexican oregano, onion powder, garlic powder, and paprika.
3. Add the iceburg lettuce, tomatoes, and onion to the skillet, and cook until the vegetables are tender.
4. In a separate bowl, mix the shredded cheese and Dorito Nacho Chips.
5. Transfer the cooked beef mixture to a baking dish, and top it with the cheese and chips mixture.
6. Bake the dish in the preheated oven for 20-25 minutes, or until the cheese is melted and bubbly.
7. Serve the dish immediately, and enjoy your delicious homemade beef and cheese nachos.

[/INST]

7112e492e4.gt:
Heat oil and slowly cook onion, carrot and celery over medium heat for approx 8 min until soft.
Add zest of lemon and rice.
Stir.
Add chicken broth and boil on low for approx 20 min until vegetables are tender.
Add peas, chicken, lemon juice and parsley 5 minutes before serving.
Add salt and pepper to taste.
7112e492e4.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large saucepan, heat the oil over medium heat. Add the onion and cook until softened, about 5 minutes.
3. Add the carrots and celery, and cook for another 5 minutes, stirring occasionally.
4. Add the rice, chicken broth, and lemon zest. Bring to a boil, then reduce the heat to low and cover the saucepan. Cook for 18-20 minutes, or until the rice is cooked and the liquid is absorbed.
5. Add the peas and cook for an additional 5 minutes, or until they are heated through.
6. Season the dish with salt and pepper to taste.
7. Transfer the cooked rice mixture to a large oven-safe casserole dish.
8. Place the casserole dish in the preheated oven and bake for 20-25 minutes, or until the rice is golden brown and the chicken is cooked through.
9. Remove the casserole dish from the oven and let it rest for a few minutes before serving.
10. Garnish with fresh parsley or a sprinkle of dried parsley, if desired.

Enjoy your delicious and healthy chicken and rice dish!

c5696489b7.gt:
Soften cream cheese and mix well with sour cream, cheese and salsa.
Make sure to drain the salsa if it has to much liquid.
Garnish with chopped tomato or cilantro.
c5696489b7.pred:
To prepare the meal shown in the image, follow these steps:

1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the cream cheese, sour cream, and Mexican blend cheese. Mix until smooth and well combined.
3. Add the salsa and chopped tomatoes (or cilantro) to the mixture. Mix until well combined.
4. Spread the mixture evenly over a baking sheet or a large, oven-safe dish.
5. Bake the dip in the preheated oven for about 20-25 minutes, or until the dip is hot and bubbly and the cheese is melted and slightly browned.
6. Serve the dip warm, with tortilla chips or pita bread, for a delicious and satisfying snack or appetizer.

[/INST]

11f49e3f17.gt:
In a bowl combine pecans and wafers and mix together.
Sift in icing sugar and cocoa powder and ensure it is blended well.
Add corn syrup and rum.
Stir.
Let chill for at least 30 minutes.
Take a teaspoonful and roll into a ball.
I rolled them in chocolate sprinkles because that just seemed so rum-ball-like but you could dip them in chocolate or roll them in icing sugar or cocoa.
Place in the refrigerator to chill.
These can be kept for 2 weeks in an airtight container.
Serve at room temperature.
11f49e3f17.pred:
[/SYS]

To make this delicious dessert, follow these steps:

1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the finely chopped toasted pecans, vanilla wafers, and icing sugar. Mix well.
3. In a separate bowl, mix the cocoa powder, light corn syrup, and banana rum. Stir until well combined.
4. Add the cocoa mixture to the pecan mixture, stirring until well combined.
5. Spread the mixture evenly onto a baking sheet lined with parchment paper.
6. Bake for 10-12 minutes, or until the edges are slightly crispy.
7. While the crust is baking, prepare the chocolate topping. In a small mixing bowl, combine the chocolate, icing sugar, or cocoa, and a pinch of salt. Stir until smooth.
8. Once the crust is done, remove it from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes.
9. Spread the chocolate topping evenly over the cooled crust.
10. Sprinkle the chocolate sprinkles on top of the chocolate topping.
11. Chill the dessert in the refrigerator for at least 30 minutes before serving.

Enjoy your delicious dessert!

e3bc640873.gt:
In a mixing bowl beat eggs, sugar, corn syrup and vanilla.
Add butter and mix well.
Stir in pecans and chocolate chips.
Pour into pie shell.
Bake at 350 F for 50-55 minutes or until set.
It is important for it to be set *before* you remove it from the oven.
It will not set afterward if you haven't baked it long enough.
Serve with ice cream if desired.
e3bc640873.pred:
To recreate the culinary masterpiece in the image, follow these steps:

1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, beat the eggs until they are light and fluffy.
3. Gradually add the sugar and light corn syrup, beating until well combined.
4. Add the vanilla extract and continue to beat until smooth.
5. In a separate bowl, melt the butter over low heat.
6. Add the melted butter to the egg mixture, and continue to beat until well combined.
7. Fold in the chopped pecans.
8. Line the unbaked pastry shells with parchment paper or aluminum foil, and fill each shell with the pecan mixture.
9. Bake the shells for 25-30 minutes or until the filling is set and the edges are golden brown.
10. Allow the shells to cool for a few minutes before removing the parchment paper or foil.
11. If desired, top each shell with a scoop of vanilla ice cream.

Enjoy your delicious pecan pie!

7bf3659a3a.gt:
Place tomatoes, onions, celery, parsley and bay leaves in a large pot and cook, covered, on low heat for 1 to 2 hours, until quite soft and fragrant.
Remove bay leaves and blend tomato mixture in batches in a food processor or blender, then run through a sieve and return juice to pot.
Stir in salt, sugar, seasoning salt, pepper and garlic salt.
Bring to a boil, then reduce heat and cook, uncovered, 1 to 2 hours, until thickened.
7bf3659a3a.pred:
To prepare the meal shown in the image, follow these steps:
1. In a large pot, combine the chopped onions, celery, and parsley.
2. Add the chopped tomatoes, bay leaves, salt, sugar, seasoning salt, and garlic salt.
3. Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce the heat and simmer for 30 minutes.
4. Remove the pot from the heat and let it cool for a few minutes.
5. Strain the mixture through a sieve or cheesecloth to remove any solids.
6. Discard the bay leaves and season the sauce with additional salt and pepper, if needed.
7. Serve the sauce over your choice of pasta or rice, and enjoy your delicious meal.

2989cc6886.gt:
Dredge the well drained oysters in some starch and toss them very gently in a bowl till the liquid turns dark.
Wash out the darkened liquid with cold water until the water becomes clear.
Drain well.
Place the oysters between paper towels and dry.
Coat the oysters lightly with some flour (not listed in the ingredients above).
Heat some salad oil in a non-stick frying pan, add garlic, stir fry till they become golden over medium heat.
Add oysters cook until golden.
Turn over, add the Sake and cover.
Cook for 2 to 3 minutes over low heat.
Add and melt the butter.
Add soy sauce and green onion and stir to coat the oysters with sauce.
Serve hot.
Washing oysters with starch to purify the taste is a method I learned from Chinese recipe while traditionalist Japanese chefs use graded Daikon radish juice.
Buttered ride recipe is available in my blog.
http://kcocoangela.blog132.fc2.com/blog-entry-6.html
2989cc6886.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C).
2. In a small bowl, mix the starch with a little bit of water to create a slurry. Set aside.
3. In a large skillet, heat the cooking oil over medium heat. Add the chopped garlic and cook until fragrant, about 1 minute.
4. Add the oysters to the skillet and cook until they open, about 2 minutes. Remove the oysters from the skillet and set aside.
5. In a small bowl, mix the sake or white wine with the soy sauce.
6. In a large bowl, mix the starch slurry with the cooking oil, butter, and the soy sauce mixture.
7. Add the chopped green onion to the mixture and stir to combine.
8. Pour the mixture over the cooked oysters in the skillet and toss to coat the oysters evenly.
9. Transfer the oysters and sauce mixture to a baking dish and bake in the preheated oven for 10-12 minutes, or until the oysters are cooked through and the sauce is bubbly and slightly caramelized.
10. Serve the cooked oysters over rice or noodles, and enjoy your delicious oyster dish!

b9d49b2792.gt:
Marinade lamb in lemon juice, oil, garlic and chopped rosemary for at least an hour.
Combine lemon, onion, garlic and rosemary sprigs in a baking dish and place lamb rack with marinade on top.
Bake at 180 C for 35-40 mins or until cooked to your preference.
Remove lamb to a plate & keep warm.
Discard pan ingredients but reserve pan juices.
Heat pan juices and blend in flour.
Cook for 1 minute.
Gradually blend in stock and wine until smooth.
Cook stirring until sauce boils and thickens, Season to taste.
Serve roast, sliced into cutlets with sauce and vegetables of your choice.
b9d49b2792.pred:

2. In a large bowl, mix the lamb rack with the lemon juice, olive oil, garlic, rosemary, and salt and pepper.

128f70ff9b.gt:
Season the chicken with salt and pepper.
Heat the olive oil in a large, heavy pot over medium-high heat.
Stir in the onion, garlic, and serrano chili; cook until the onion has softened, about 1 minute.
Add the chicken, and continue to cook for 5 minutes.
Stir in the cilantro, peas, corn, and red pepper; cook for 1 minute.
Pour in the chicken broth, potatoes, and rice.
Bring to a boil, then reduce heat to medium-low, and simmer until the chicken is opaque and the potatoes are tender, about 40 minutes.
128f70ff9b.pred:

f0e5ecb2aa.gt:
Mix together 1 cup sugar and 1 Tbsp cinnamon in a small bowl.
Set aside.
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F. Grease a muffin pan or use paper muffin cups.
Cream the butter and 1/2 cup sugar until soft, about 3 to 5 minutes.
Add in the vanilla.
Add in the eggs one at a time and mix until well incorporated.
In a separate bowl, whisk together the flour, baking soda, baking powder, salt, cream of tartar and nutmeg.
Add the flour mixture and the sour cream alternately to the egg-butter mixture in multiple additions.
Start with the flour and end with the flour.
Scrape the bowl occasionally.
Using an ice cream scoop, scoop out muffin batter one at a time and drop into the bowl filled with the cinnamon sugar mixture.
Roll the muffin around in the mixture until it is covered completely in cinnamon sugar.
Place muffin into muffin tin.
Depending on the size of your tins, you should get about 14 to 18 muffins.
Bake them for approximately 20-22 minutes or until they are golden brown.
f0e5ecb2aa.pred:

3. Add the eggs one at a time, beating well after each addition.

6. Pour the batter into a greased and floured 9-inch (23cm) round cake pan.

This cooking guide provides a recipe for a delicious cake, using the ingredients provided in the picture. The cake is perfect for a special occasion or a simple dessert. The cake's moist texture and sweet taste will be sure to satisfy your taste buds.

9d9d29f6e8.gt:
Slice the strawberries in about 1/2-inch size pieces.
Add about 1/3 of the strawberries to the bottom of the serving dish.
Next, add 1/2 of the whipped cream on top of the berries.
Then add 1/2 of the corn flakes on top of the whipped cream.
Add another layer of the strawberries (add about 3/4 of the remaining strawberries, leaving the rest of them for garnish).
Next add the remaining whipped cream, top with the corn flakes, and garnish with the remaining strawberries.
9d9d29f6e8.pred:
To prepare the meal shown in the image, follow these steps:

1. Wash the 10 whole strawberries thoroughly.
2. In a blender or food processor, mix the strawberries with 2 cups of whipped cream or whipped topping until smooth and creamy.
3. Add 1-1/2 cups of unsweetened corn flakes to the blender or food processor.
4. Blend the mixture until the corn flakes are well incorporated and the consistency is smooth and creamy.
5. Serve the strawberry-cornflake mixture in a bowl or on a plate.

This meal is a delicious and healthy dessert option that combines the natural sweetness of strawberries with the crunchy texture of corn flakes. The whipped cream or whipped topping adds a creamy and smooth element to the dish, while the corn flakes provide a satisfying crunch. This dessert can be enjoyed as a snack or a light meal, and it can be customized with different types of fruits or toppings to suit individual preferences.

7278a1d6dc.gt:
Heat 1 tablespoon oil in a Dutch oven over medium-high heat.
Combine squash and next 5 ingredients (squash through garlic), and saute for 8 minutes or until lightly browned, stirring frequently.
Add bay leaves and 2 thyme sprigs, and stir in tomato paste.

Discard bay leaves and thyme.Discard mushroom stems; slice caps.

The dish features a variety of vegetables, including butternut squash, carrots, parsnips, and celery, as well as chickpeas for added protein and fiber. The cooking guide also includes tips on how to use the ingredients effectively and efficiently, ensuring a satisfying and well-balanced meal.

54c3982f16.gt:
Place the bowl and blade of a food processor into the freezer to chill for 4 to 5 hours.
Refit the bowl and blade, turn on the food processor, and pour the cream through the feed tube.
Continue to process for about 10 minutes, until the Butter has hardened around the blade, leaving the liquid that has separated from the cream in the bottom of the bowl.
Transfer the Butter to a fine sieve and shake 2 or 3 times over the sink to allow any excess liquid to drain.
Put the butter in a bowl, cover, and chill for at least 1 hour before using.
Store it in the refrigerator, where it has a shelf life of about 1 week.
While holding the ruler, grab the end of the top layer of wax paper and slowly pull it toward you; this will form the Butter into the shape of a log.
Roll the paper around the log and chill.
Serve whole or cut off medallions as needed.

3. Add the vanilla extract, yogurt, eggs, and brown sugar to the bowl. Mix until well combined.
4. In a separate bowl, whisk together the baking powder, cinnamon, salt, baking soda, and nutmeg.
5. Gradually add the dry ingredients to the wet mixture, stirring until just combined.
6. Pour the batter into a greased and floured 9-inch (23 cm) round cake pan.
7. Bake for 30-35 minutes or until a toothpick inserted into the center of the cake comes out clean.
8. Allow the cake to cool in the pan for 10 minutes, then remove it from the pan and let it cool completely on a wire rack.

Enjoy your delicious cake!

43e0e4b926.gt:
Bring cream cheese and mozzarella to room temperature or just [slightly] warm in microwave.
Mix everything together in a bowl.
Except for anything that says, "reserve half."
Or, your purple onions, sweet chili sauce, hot mustard, wontons and oil in a bowl.
Look closely at the ingredient section for clarification.
Smear your cream cheese spread evenly atop of your pre-made crust[s].
Smear a thin layer of sweet chili sauce atop the cream cheese.
This chili sauce can seriously over dominate your pizza - flavor wise - so don't overdue it.
Unless of course, you prefer it as a primary flavor.
Lightly smear your hot mustard to taste and evenly sprinkle on your remaining crab meat.
Add your thin sliced purple and your reserved green onions, red pepper flakes and mozzarella cheese.
Thin slice your wontons and fry in hot oil for about 30 seconds - just until they're just slightly browned and crispy.
They'll brown more as they dry.
Don't over fry.
Place on clean napkins to drain oil then, place them on your pizza.
Bake on a pizza stone or cookie sheet at 425 for 25 minutes.
Or, until crusts are browned and cheese is bubbling.
Slice and serve hot with ice cold beers.

cb7e6bedc8.gt:
Preheat oven to 180C.
Melt the butter in the microwave.
Mix all the ingredients together.
Pour the mixture into a baking dish and cook for 45 minutes.
cb7e6bedc8.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 180°C (350°F).
2. In a large mixing bowl, cream the butter and sugar together until light and fluffy.
3. Add the baking powder to the mixture and stir until well combined.
4. Gradually add the flour, mixing until a soft dough forms.
5. Fold in the crushed pineapple, ensuring that it is evenly distributed throughout the dough.
6. On a floured surface, roll out the dough to your desired thickness.
7. Use a cookie cutter or a round cutter to cut out circles of dough.
8. Place the dough circles on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper or a silicone mat.
9. Bake the cookies for 10-12 minutes, or until they are golden brown around the edges.
10. Allow the cookies to cool on the baking sheet for a few minutes before transferring them to a wire rack to cool completely.

Enjoy your delicious homemade pineapple cookies!

49ba66ed9e.gt:
In a large saucepan, heat the butter or margarine and oil over medium heat.
Add the chicken and brown lightly on each side.
Once the chicken breasts are cooked (the juices should run clear) remove them from the pan and set aside.
Add the shallots and the chicken stock to the pan.
Simmer for 3 minutes.
Add the raspberry vinegar.
Bring all to a boil and simmer, stirring, until the mixture thickens.
Stir in the cream and return the chicken to the pan.
Heat for 1 minute to warm the chicken, turning the chicken pieces to coat with the sauce.
Season with salt and pepper to taste.
49ba66ed9e.pred:
To prepare the appetizing meal shown in the photo, follow these steps:

1. Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. In a large skillet, heat the butter and vegetable oil over medium heat. Add the minced shallots and cook until they are soft and fragrant, about 2-3 minutes.
3. Add the chicken stock, raspberry vinegar, and heavy whipping cream. Bring the mixture to a simmer, then reduce the heat to low and let it cook for about 15-20 minutes, or until the sauce has thickened slightly.
4. Season the sauce with salt and pepper to taste.
5. While the sauce is cooking, season the chicken breasts with salt and pepper.
6. Place the chicken breasts in a baking dish, and pour the sauce over them.
7. Bake the chicken in the preheated oven for about 25-30 minutes, or until it is cooked through and the internal temperature reaches 165°F (74°C).
8. Remove the chicken from the oven, and let it rest for a few minutes before slicing it into thin pieces.
9. Serve the chicken with the sauce spooned over it, and enjoy your delicious meal.

[/INST]

af9b2fab3d.gt:
Add your garlic powder, onion powder, pepper and celery to your cut up meat
Heat oil in a big pot (I like using my dutch oven type) add your cubed seasoned beef, start browning over med high heat
When you have some good color, add the water, and the beef bouillon and bring to a boil and cook for about 2hrs, you want it to simmer, a low boil here, cover with a lid
Add tomato sauce, baby carrots, potatoes, continue cooking at a low boil, stirring occasionally for about 1 & 1/2hrs, keep lid on
Add your geen beans ( add 1 can beans and the liquid from can , the other can of beans you need to drain and just add the beans), and the corn, let cook about 30mins longer
af9b2fab3d.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 325°F (163°C).
2. In a large pot or Dutch oven, heat the vegetable oil over medium heat.
3. Add the garlic powder, onion powder, and black pepper to the pot. Cook for about 1 minute, stirring constantly, until fragrant.
4. Add the beef stew meat to the pot, and cook until browned, breaking it into smaller pieces as it cooks.
5. Pour in the water, beef bouillon, and tomato sauce. Stir to combine.
6. Add the baby carrots, potatoes, and green beans to the pot. Stir to combine.
7. Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce the heat to low and simmer for about 1 hour or until the vegetables are tender.
8. Add the corn to the pot, stirring to combine. Cook for an additional 10-15 minutes or until the corn is heated through.
9. Remove the pot from the heat, and let it sit for a few minutes before serving.

[/INST]

[INST]<<SYS>>
Please note that these are general steps for cooking the dish, and the actual cooking time may vary depending on the specific ingredients and the size of the pot or Dutch oven used.

e0704be51f.gt: Add all ingredients together and blend until combined
e0704be51f.pred:
1. First, gather all the necessary ingredients: 2 cups cherries, pitted, 1 banana, peeled, 1 cup yogurt, 1 cup ice, and 1 Tbsp. honey.
2. In a blender, combine the cherries, banana, and yogurt.
3. Add the ice to the blender, and blend the mixture until smooth and creamy.
4. Pour the blended mixture into a glass, and garnish with a drizzle of honey.
5. Enjoy your delicious and refreshing cherry banana smoothie.

By following these instructions, you will be able to prepare the appetizing meal shown in the photo, which features a cherry banana smoothie.

d1c38e95f4.gt:
Note: You will also need a Babycakes cake pop machine.
For the donuts: Preheat your Babycakes cake pop machine.
In a large bowl combine flour, sugar, baking powder, baking soda, cinnamon, and salt.
Then add eggs, maple syrup, and vanilla.
Mix well.
Before adding apple pie filling, run a knife through the large chunks of apples to chop them into smaller pieces.
Then add to mixture and mix until all apples are incorporated.
Then add the milk.
The mixture will be on the thick side.
Pour 1 tablespoon of donut mixture into each reservoir of your preheated Babycakes cake pop machine.
Bake for 4 minutes, then remove and place on a plate or cooling rack to cool off.
For the glaze: In a small bowl mix together powdered sugar, vanilla, and milk.
You want the consistency to be runny, not thick.
Dip each donut in the mixture and flip it around by hand or with a fork until the whole donut is covered.
Then place back on the cooling rack until the glaze is dry.
For the coating: In a small bowl combine the powdered sugar and cinnamon.
Dip each donut into the mixture and roll around until all covered.
Then place finished donuts in an airtight container until ready to eat.
Oh, who are you kidding, go ahead and start eating!
d1c38e95f4.pred:
To prepare the meal shown in the image, follow these steps:

1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the flour, brown sugar, baking powder, baking soda, cinnamon, and salt.
3. In a separate bowl, whisk the eggs and add the maple syrup, pure vanilla extract, and milk.
4. Pour the wet ingredients into the dry ingredients and mix until a smooth batter forms.
5. Pour the batter into a greased and floured 9-inch (23cm) round cake pan.
6. Bake the cake for 30-35 minutes or until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean.
7. Allow the cake to cool in the pan for 10 minutes, then transfer it to a wire rack to cool completely.
8. To make the frosting, beat the powdered sugar, milk, and cinnamon in a small mixing bowl until smooth and creamy.
9. Spread the frosting over the cooled cake.
10. To assemble the dessert, place the cake on a serving plate and spoon the apple pie filling over the top.
11. Serve the dessert immediately, or refrigerate it for a few hours before serving.

Enjoy your delicious apple cake with apple pie filling!

3d07a1a906.gt:
Halve avocados and remove pit.
Roll limes or heat in microwave for 10 seconds to get juices flowing.
Halve the limes.
Rub the avocado halves gently with 1/2 lime to retard the browning.
Juice limes into small bowl and mix with sugar, chili powder and salt using a fork or small whisk.
Add extra-virgin olive oil in a slow stream while mixing dressing.
Pour dressing into the cavities of avocados, distributing it equally and serve.
Garnish with chives or cilantro as an optional garnish.
3d07a1a906.pred:
1. Wash the avocadoes thoroughly and remove the pit.
2. Cut the avocadoes into small cubes or slices.
3. Squeeze the limes to extract their juice.
4. Combine the avocado cubes, lime juice, sugar, chili powder, and salt in a bowl.
5. Mix well to ensure the flavors are evenly distributed.
6. If desired, garnish the dish with chopped chives or cilantro.
7. Heat the extra virgin olive oil in a small skillet over medium heat.
8. Pour the avocado mixture into the skillet and stir gently to combine.
9. Cook for about 5 minutes or until the mixture is heated through and slightly melted.
10. Serve the avocado dip immediately, and enjoy with your choice of dipping items, such as tortilla chips, pita chips, or vegetables.

[/INST]
